story:
A little background to what's been happening:

Over the past few  weeks, the Sudanese government has gone on a rampant "structural adjustment" scheme, which has led to the lifting of subsidies on basic necessities such as fuel, electricity, and now drugs and medication. As a result, the price of medicine has risen up to 300%. Asthma inhalers (in a country with rampant dust storms on the regular) once costed 140 SDG ($24) and now cost a whopping 470-720 SDG ($81-$124); This is all in a country where a lucky high-end professional (e.g.doctor) may earn about 1000 SDG/month ($173).  There has been an active and collective effort to get this message across by pharmacists, doctors, the local communities, youth and the diaspora.

 

We, the youth of Sudan both living abroad and inside the country are working together  hand-in-hand to raise awareness regarding the current tragic situation in our home country. Through raising money we plan on buying and distributing medicine to those who are in need and can't afford it. There have been cases of people dying due to insufficient funds to purchase the medicine they need to stay alive (e.g.the very basic Ventolin inhaler for Asthma.)

story:
What makes Pacific Pain Relief so special?

  1. All-Natural Plant Based Ingredients.
  2. Proven Homeopathic Active Ingredients.
  3. Fast Acting.
  4. Use as Needed.
  5. No Strong Odor.
  6. Versatile.
  7. First, 4,000 Units are Ready to Ship.

The team at Med-X have spent over two years developing the proprietary formula of Pacific Pain Relief Cream. 

We are excited to offer it first to the Indiegogo community. 

 

 

 

  • Apply a small amount of cream to areas where the pain is present, and massage into skin.
  • Use as needed and or when pain flares up.
  • Store at 68 to 77 degrees Fahrenheit.
  • For external use only.
  • Avoid contact with eyes and open wounds.
  • Stop use and ask a doctor if the condition persists for more than 7 days or worsens.
  • Keep out of the reach of children.
  • In case of ingestion, seek professional assistance or contact a poison control center.

Active Ingredients: Bryonia 6x HPUS, Rhus Toxicodendron 6x HPUS

Inactive Ingredients: Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Stearic Acid, Polysorbate 60, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Oil), Hemp Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propylene, Glycol, Mineral Oil, Myristyl Myristate, Glycine Soja (Soybean), Sodium Chloride, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis )Sweet Almond) Oil, Menthol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Squalene, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Allium Sativum (Garlic) Bulb Extract, Glycerin, Caprylhydoxamic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol.

Distributed by: Med-X, Inc. Canoga Park, CA 91304 - P:818-349-2870 w:Medx-rx.com

 

 

Our company, Med-X, Inc. is a leader in green technology. We develop and sell products that solve people's everyday problems like pain relief and pest control without using dangerous synthetic chemicals. Our other safe product lines include Nature-Cide and Thermal-Aid. Both lines have national distribution.


The Malibu Brands Pacific Pain Relief cream is our newest brand and product offering. We feel strongly that the only way to make a change and combat tough issues like the opiate crisis in this country is to offer products and solutions to people that work. If people do not have alternatives, how can we expect change? We know that people want to have clean, safe options to promote a healthy lifestyle. This product offers people temporary relief for chronic and everyday pain without synthetic chemicals.

With support from our thousands of investors from StartEngine, our company has been able to develop and go to market with some incredible natural products. One of our most successful products is our Thermal-Aid Headache Relief System.

This product was proven effective and developed by one of our board members, Dr. Morton Hyson, a board-certified neurologist from Las Vegas. The Thermal-Aid product is used by thousands of headache sufferers all over the country.

 

These questions from our community lead us to explore this opportunity and after two years of development, the Formulation for the Malibu Brands Pacific Pain Relief Cream became a reality.

story:
Melanin Essentials seeks to address (3) issues: 

 

1. Lack of access to quality products for women of color 

 

"She keeps buying with the hope that this product will do what it’s supposed to do.” 

—Essence’s 2009 study 

Furthermore, due to the media's definition of beauty, many women of color have used chemical hair relaxers, skin-bleaching creams, hot iron combs and other harmful means to fit the mold. These practices have resulted in health issues such as alopecia, hair loss, and skin ailments as well as psychological health issues; namely, insecurity of skin color and hair type and a negative self image.

 

2. Job insecurity and low income for single mothers

In 2013, the poverty rate for single-mother families was 39.6%, nearly five times more than the 7.6% rate for married-couple families.

 

3. Chemical Ingredients within the Cosmetic Industry

The average US woman uses 12 personal care products and/or cosmetics a day, containing 168 different chemicals. While most men use fewer products, they're still exposed to about 85 such chemicals daily, while teens, who use an average of 17 personal care products a day, are exposed to even more.

—Environmental Working Group

 

Our Model

We will address the (3) issues above with our business model:

With our unique hiring process, will provide secure, thriving wage jobs to single mothers, starting at $15/hr. As our company grows, we will then implement our Mommyhood Matters initiative. This program will offer our single mom employees flexible hours, employee perks, and, someday, hopefully free child care.​

 

As for our products, our philosophy — less is more.

Using as few ingredients as possible, we make our products with certified organic, fair-trade, and natural ingredients formulated to nourish, condition, and promote healthy hair and skin. We hope to empower women of color not only with products that work but also with our message to love yourself regardless of skin tone or hair type.   

    

Our products are then packaged in biodegradable and recyclable materials to reduce waste in landfills and protect our oceans. It’s just the right thing to do.

 

Impact 

This is more than a business that sells eco-friendly personal care products — it’s a movement to shine light, spread hope, and uplift.  

With our business model, we will be creating employment opportunities for single mothers who are living (or at risk of living) in poverty, breaking barriers within the colored community, and promoting eco-friendly, sustainable lifestyles.

 

What We Need 

Our goal of $16,200 will enable us to launch in the Fall of 2016 with the ability to sufficiently handle an increase in sales and product expansion, so that we can hire at least 2 employees in 2017. 

 

Even better, if we are not able to reach our goal, we will still be able to keep ALL funds. No dollar will go to waste. We will buy all of the ingredients necessary to begin making products right away! We also plan to host other events, outside campaigns to continue to spread awareness and support to begin. 

We Are.. Melanin Essentials

As women of color with backgrounds in biology, chemistry, sociology, and political affairs, we are          well-rounded to take on such a project. Melanin Essentials  started with us at the ages of 12 and 15 with chemically  relaxed hair. Desperate for a change, we became the  change we wished to see, and made our own natural  hair products from home. Here we are today embracing  our natural curls with a motivation to spread awareness and access to healthy products for others who were just like us — struggling to find products that properly nourish their hair, skin, and body. 

     

    Join us!

    1.  Back us (Donate) to help us launch!

    2.  Follow us to get updates on our journey.

    3.  If you can't donate, maybe someone you know know can: share our story on your social media!

     

    This crowdfunding campaign is part of The Great Social Enterprise Pitch, a friendly competition facilitated by ASSETS and the Lancaster County Community Foundation. The Pitch consists of social enterprise ideas based in Central Pennsylvania. A Social Enterprise is a market-based, income-generating enterprise that aims to solve a social and/or environmental problem through its business activities.  Social enterprises focus on a trip bottom line:  people, planet, and profit.  Upon completion of the Crowdfunding phase of the competition, 5 ideas will be chosen to move on to the Live Pitch, during which the contestants will present their ideas to a panel of judges, with winners receiving a package of cash and pro-bono prizes. In 2015, winners received over $50,000 in cash and pro-bono prizes.

    Please visit www.lancasterpitch.com for more information.  To access to the crowdfunding sites of all participating social enterprise ideas, click here: https://www.indiegogo.com/partners/SocialEnterp....

story:
Introducing HEXY, the world's first Exfoliating Gloves with the POWER of Micro Suction! Hexy gloves combine recycled polyester with ultra soft silicone suction fingertips. The result is a powerful cleansing glove that gives you a deeper clean that you can really feel!

The exfoliating material helps to remove dead skin cells, dirt, oil, make up and more, while the silicone suction cups use positive and negative pressure to help your cleanser penetrate your pores and suck out any blockages. Hexy gloves offer a simple and affordable solution to a problem we all deal with every day.  

Hexy’s exfoliating material eliminates the need for microbeads that are commonly found in exfoliating scrubs. These tiny plastic particles can be environmentally detrimental as they cannot easily be filtered from water supplies. Hexy gloves also reduce soap usage by providing excellent lathering capabilities. Using less cleanser with each wash equals more savings in your pocket! Besides just looking better, having clean and healthy skin can help boost your overall immune system as your skin is your number one defense barrier to external bacteria, viruses and infections. There's so many reasons to love Hexy!

Hexy gloves are designed to be simple to use and effective with all cleansers and skin types. If you know how to wash your face, you've got all the skills you need to use Hexy!

First dampen the gloves with warm water. Then apply your favorite cleanser and rub to a foamy lather. Now wash your face or body as normal, letting Hexy's gentle exfoliation and micro suction fingertips do all the work. To clean up just rinse off the gloves, squeeze out the excess water, and hang to dry.

All that's left to do now is admire your beautiful self in the mirror and start your day off with confidence! 

The key to Hexy's power is the use of Positive and Negative Pressure. There are 7 suction cups on each finger, totaling 28 suction cups on each glove or 56 on both hands. When compressed, each suction cup creates positive pressure on your skin. This helps your cleanser penetrate your pores giving you that deep clean feeling. When the suction cups rebound, they pull back on your skin creating negative pressure. This negative pressure helps to suck out any microscopic blockages trapped in your pores, reducing the chance of skin blemishes such as blackheads, whiteheads and acne.   

The hexagonal "honeycomb" design allows for interaction between each individual suction cup, ensuring a constant change of pressure levels as you scrub. This back and forth between positive and negative pressure creates Micro Suction on the surface of your skin. This type of suction works at the microscopic level, unclogging your pores one by one, enhancing the power of your cleanser, and stimulating blood flow to the epidermis. Facial suctioning can be highly effective in improving the overall health and appearance of the skin, leading to less inflammation, acne and redness. Hexy provides adequate suction without damaging blood vessels just under the skin's surface. Other devices that use high strength mechanical suctioning can strain and bruise the skin, sometimes leading to permanent skin damage. That's why Hexy uses gentle, skin-safe suction combined with exfoliation to treat blemishes in a safe and effective manner.

Featured on The Style O.G. - Jeff tests and reviews Hexy and gives some great tips on exfoliating. Check out the video below!

Featured on Tara and Hunter - These two give Hexy a try while detailing their travel skin care routine!

Hexy gloves currently come in 4 colours, Ocean, Glacier, Flamingo and Charcoal. Perfect for complimenting your personal style and bathroom decor. Choose our 4 pack reward to get one of each colour! We are completely open to making more colour options if our campaign is successfully funded, so let us know in the comments what colours you'd like to see!

 

A fresh face with Hexy is a great way to start or finish your day! Incorporate Hexy gloves into your normal hygiene routine and feel the difference after just 1 week! 95% of our beta testers said their skin felt noticeably softer after their first week of use. Join the Hexy movement and order your own pair today!  

Our Beta Testing program was a big success for Hexy. It was after getting these great reviews that we realized Hexy could be BIG! Our testers agreed that our gloves are great all around cleansers that give awesome results. See what all the hype is about by ordering your own pair of Hexy gloves today!

 

 

Hexy ships worldwide! Shipping will be 6-12$ depending on your distance from North America and will be charged after the campaign ends.
story_txt:
Introducing HEXY, the world's first Exfoliating Gloves with the POWER of Micro Suction! Hexy gloves combine recycled polyester with ultra soft silicone suction fingertips. The result is a powerful cleansing glove that gives you a deeper clean that you can really feel!The exfoliating material helps to remove dead skin cells, dirt, oil, make up and more, while the silicone suction cups use positive and negative pressure to help your cleanser penetrate your pores and suck out any blockages. Hexy gloves offer a simple and affordable solution to a problem we all deal with every day.  Hexy’s exfoliating material eliminates the need for microbeads that are commonly found in exfoliating scrubs. These tiny plastic particles can be environmentally detrimental as they cannot easily be filtered from water supplies. Hexy gloves also reduce soap usage by providing excellent lathering capabilities. Using less cleanser with each wash equals more savings in your pocket! Besides just looking better, having clean and healthy skin can help boost your overall immune system as your skin is your number one defense barrier to external bacteria, viruses and infections. There's so many reasons to love Hexy!Hexy gloves are designed to be simple to use and effective with all cleansers and skin types. If you know how to wash your face, you've got all the skills you need to use Hexy!First dampen the gloves with warm water. Then apply your favorite cleanser and rub to a foamy lather. Now wash your face or body as normal, letting Hexy's gentle exfoliation and micro suction fingertips do all the work. To clean up just rinse off the gloves, squeeze out the excess water, and hang to dry.All that's left to do now is admire your beautiful self in the mirror and start your day off with confidence! The key to Hexy's power is the use of Positive and Negative Pressure. There are 7 suction cups on each finger, totaling 28 suction cups on each glove or 56 on both hands. When compressed, each suction cup creates positive pressure on your skin. This helps your cleanser penetrate your pores giving you that deep clean feeling. When the suction cups rebound, they pull back on your skin creating negative pressure. This negative pressure helps to suck out any microscopic blockages trapped in your pores, reducing the chance of skin blemishes such as blackheads, whiteheads and acne.   The hexagonal "honeycomb" design allows for interaction between each individual suction cup, ensuring a constant change of pressure levels as you scrub. This back and forth between positive and negative pressure creates Micro Suction on the surface of your skin. This type of suction works at the microscopic level, unclogging your pores one by one, enhancing the power of your cleanser, and stimulating blood flow to the epidermis. Facial suctioning can be highly effective in improving the overall health and appearance of the skin, leading to less inflammation, acne and redness. Hexy provides adequate suction without damaging blood vessels just under the skin's surface. Other devices that use high strength mechanical suctioning can strain and bruise the skin, sometimes leading to permanent skin damage. That's why Hexy uses gentle, skin-safe suction combined with exfoliation to treat blemishes in a safe and effective manner.Featured on The Style O.G. - Jeff tests and reviews Hexy and gives some great tips on exfoliating. Check out the video below!
Featured on Tara and Hunter - These two give Hexy a try while detailing their travel skin care routine!


Hexy gloves currently come in 4 colours, Ocean, Glacier, Flamingo and Charcoal. Perfect for complimenting your personal style and bathroom decor. Choose our 4 pack reward to get one of each colour! We are completely open to making more colour options if our campaign is successfully funded, so let us know in the comments what colours you'd like to see! A fresh face with Hexy is a great way to start or finish your day! Incorporate Hexy gloves into your normal hygiene routine and feel the difference after just 1 week! 95% of our beta testers said their skin felt noticeably softer after their first week of use. Join the Hexy movement and order your own pair today!  Our Beta Testing program was a big success for Hexy. It was after getting these great reviews that we realized Hexy could be BIG! Our testers agreed that our gloves are great all around cleansers that give awesome results. See what all the hype is about by ordering your own pair of Hexy gloves today!  Hexy ships worldwide! Shipping will be 6-12$ depending on your distance from North America and will be charged after the campaign ends.

story:
Friends and Family of Kathleen's-

Lets pool together our resources to help buy a new bike to replace the one that was stolen May 7th.

Kathleen is passionate about using her bike not only to live a healthier life, but also inspire others with diabetes to do the same. She is a dedicated person in all aspects of her life, and is now training for an Ironman Arizona this fall. She NEEDS a bike that she can fly on!

We, her teammates for IMAZ (Lydnsay, Nancy, Lorrie, Susie, and Karyn), have put this together WITHOUT her knowledge, because we love her and we have a huge interest in getting her to the finishline! And as they say, there is no "I" in team, so let's get her the funds for a shiny new bike!

She does so much for others-lets do this for her!!!

story:
AS SEEN IN

 

The Sandusa Story

 

Nice pictures, but whats the go?

Everyone loves the beach. But nobody loves having a wet, sandy towel and car on the way home. This is where the concept for the Sandusa Beach Towel originated.

My name is Baz Brown and I'm from the Gold Coast, Australia.

Like many Australians I spend a lot of time at the beach, endlessly frustrated by the constant stream of sand flinging from my towel or scratching into my car seats. I had to find a way to leave the sand at the beach once and for all.

That's why I created the Sandusa - a comfortable towel that is both sand-resistant and waterproof.

Towel Specs 

  • The Dimensions- 1600mm x 800mm

  • The Material- Terrycloth Cotton with a nylon backing

  • The Design:

Where do the raised funds go?

I’ve been working on the Sandusa for over 3 years. The Sandusa that you see in the video is a prototype that is ready for mass production.

With your support, we can bring the Sandusa onto beaches worldwide. Your contribution will help fund:

  • product manufacturing
  • shipping, and
  • a beach towel revolution!

The Rewards

I'm keen to reward all of my backers as soon as possible. This requires a team effort. My team is ready, organised and committed to making this product a reality. Now we need your backing - check out the rewards at the top of this page. Not only do you get to be a part of the next big thing, you get a slice of the result! Say goodbye to sandy beach towels forever and reward yourself with the ultimate sand-resistant beach towel. 

Don't stop there, get involved!

We want everyone who backs the Sandusa project to be involved in the development of the product, so after you've donated:

  • actively participate in our social media discussion (see the links above). 
  • get expressive - tell us what you think. What other uses can you think of for this innovative product?

Frequently Asked Questions

At Sandusa we are regularly contacted by people with alternative ideas, suggestions and questions concerning this revolutionary product. Below is a list of the most common:

 

Is the Sandusa sandproof?

We are not magicians. If you throw sand on the Sandusa it is going to get covered in sand. The toweling side is just like a normal towel so if you get sand on that side and stomp all over it, it will remain sandy like a regular towel would.

The underside is where the magic happens (ok, maybe we are a little bit like magicians). The Base is nylon which has short “loop-less” fibres which sand does not remain stuck to. See images below: both images were taken after a few hours at the beach.The first image is a normal beach towel. The second is a Sandusa.

Unlike the regular towel, the Sandusa’s underside is effectively sand-free. 

Is the Sandusa waterproof?

Yes, you heard right. A waterproof towel. What?How?Where? Between the absorbent towel and the nylon backing is a thin layer of waterproof material. You’re welcome.

If I get stuck in sinking sand will the Sandusa save me?

Initial testing suggests yes. However if it happens to anyone, let us know how you went?

Is the Sandusa machine washable and dryable?

The Sandusa is machine washable. You can use a dryer however regular drying degrades the materials in the towel, shortening the lifespan of the product. Not to mention the environmental effects. So we suggest using the sun to dry your towel.

What other ways can I use the Sandusa?

I’m not your mother but here are a few of our favourite suggestions (let us know if you have any others):

  • Having a picnic 
  • Wrapping up wet gear – boardies, wetshirts, wetsuits, bikinis, etc
  • Using as a cot sheet – for babies and little kids
  • Protecting your car from wet bodies after a day at the beach or pool
  • Washing a dog
  • Something for the dog to sit on in the car
  • An umbrella in the rain
  • Wrapping up electronics in the rain
  • As a gym towel- to protect equipment from perspiration
  • Protecting furniture at a kid’s pool party
  • Chemical Cleaning

Whats left?

All we need now is your support. The Sandusa beach towel is ready for the world. You can help it get there by joining in the fun.   

In the Press 

  • Gold Coast Bulletin - http://www.goldcoast.com.au/article/2013/07/04/454010_gold-coast-news.html
  • BETABEAT - http://betabeat.com/2013/07/high-tech-australian-beach-towel-repels-sand-attracts-hotties/
  • Huffington Post - http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2013/07/14/sandusa-beach-towel_n_3594457.html
  • New York Daily Times - http://www.nydailynews.com/life-style/man-designs-sand-resistant-beach-towel-article-1.1415349
  • MSN Now -http://now.msn.com/sandusa-beach-towel-invented-by-baz-brown-said-to-be-sand-resistant
  • Telegraph.co.uk - http://www.telegraph.co.uk/travel/travelnews/10215807/Man-invents-sand-resistant-beach-towel.html

story:
What is iSaveLife ?

iSaveLife is a system finalized to protect human life that operates through a common network and mobile devices (Smartphone, etc.).
Do you want to be informed in real time about the risks, weather, traffic, parks, info about the area in which you live, travel or move?
Today, we are happy to present iSaveLife.
 


iSaveLife will help get you to safety from natural disasters; iSaveLife will send you information and instructions with regards to problems and alerts about  the area you live in.       


An Alert-Message can help you survive !!!

Alert sample : Warning Flooding!!! run in safe place!  with following details     .....  GPS position Saved with auto-update!  

( alert received + hard sound , alert list with details and other instructions message received to save your life)


Fire department Alert Sending sample : Warning FIRE!!! run in safe place!  with others details     .....  GPS position Saved with auto-update!  

(alert sending , choose location , draw area , chose event from list and other instructions message and save the alert on server to fast send to many peoples)

Beta application... i will develop new one for every iOs, Android and Windows Phone

All kind of events can be analyzed by International Agencies like,  NOAA (USA) CSEM-EMSC  - ISC  ( EUROPE) , ARPA ( ITALY)  , JMA ( JAPAN ) , CEA (China), Authorities and National President ..... ; the events will be sent to the system iSaveLife and forwarded to all users who have a smartphone getting  an acoustic and visual ALERT .



iSaveLife for... AID Agencies !

8 $ thank you  + 2$ for NoProfit Agency



The system iSaveLife



___________________________________________________


Features

Privacy and Data protected
Your GPS information data are protected in crypted batabase and no any kind of personal informations are stored in database ; we use only GPS mobile location data and phone id to send notifications. ( no other data are acquired).

Receive quickliy Alert/Message

The system check new ALERT and Message according your ZONE/AREA/CITY/NATION and it send instantly a notification.


Global and International

 The System can check your GPS position everywhere in the World !!!! 


S.O.S Request

 You can push S.O.S button to request AID (  Feature under test and costruction )

 *** iSaveLife  need 100k "Thank you" to complete this Feature


Social Alerts

iSaveLife  need 150k "Thank you" to complete this Feature


System Knows your GPS location for AID or send information.

 The system can sends alert or information message according to smartphone gps position.


Police and Authorities Support

iSaveLife informs police and authotities and viceversa about alerts or event occured


___________________________________________________

Our perks for Indiegogo contributors

buy a iSavelife Gadget to help me to complete my project


___________________________________________________

Stretch goal



iOS & Android app: 60k

iSaveLife will be upgrade to iOS 9  and Android 5 .0 .

Server Farm: 80k

We need create a fast and solid server farm.

S.O.S Request : 100k

iSaveLife will integrate a S.O.S button and a system to call and inform  Police/Ambulance/First Aid

Social Alerts:  150k

Many People informed with Facebook, Twitter,Google+ ... 

App for Windows Phone and BlackBerry : 300k

iSaveLife will arrive to other O.S like Windows Phone and BlackBerry with the same features.

Global API for World Agencies Interconnection : 1000k

iSaveLife  will allow world's monitoring Agencies to use single database and single system to monitor big areas and share quickly informations and to send Alerts.



            www.Sapienza.it Dott. Marina Moscarini                 www.enea.it   Dott. Flavio Fontana
I've collaborated with "La Sapienza" university and ENEA - Usability Lab with two extraordinary teachers and people with great personality. Them helped me to finalize iSavelife project. 


Help Us To Save You and your Dears! ...Intelligent Save Life


Timeline



Where the Funds Will go


The system is ready to done with most of the work already made. With a successful campaign we will start develop next release for other mobile devices.

We have come this far and now we need your support to take the next step. We will be working closely with the emergencies agencies to make sure that everything runs as smoothly as possible and you getting your app iSavelife in time.


Risks 

There's always risks that can delay the process before iSavelife will complete the way to be solid free service. We thought it might be good to share informations and everyones's support.

New release to develop: iSavelife, or any product for that matter, contains a significant amount of computer science technologies . These software contains different codes which have different developing times and we need emergencies agencies support to complete it. If ONE of these technologies will change we need upgrade iSavelife system, this will delay the entire production, if a substitute is not found for that component.

Enhancements in system: When in production there are some parameters that can be improved during the process such as the , usability, speed, stability,security etc. Making such enhancements during the process will be in order to improve your experience with iSavelife. We will do everything we can to ensure that iSavelife give to you with superior quality and better security for your life.

Shipping and customs: When we start shipping there's always a risk of the product getting stuck in customs, either when we are receiving the products from the factory or shipping them to you. We have prepared as well as we can and hopefully there won't be any delays.

For any cupon code/redeem code for app no delay sure!

story:
Sniff Relief is a self-heating face mask that warms up your nose and surrounding areas to relieve sinus pressure and alleviate the symptoms of runny noses.

Sniff Relief is super-comfortable and designed to be used while you’re awake or sleeping.

This self-heating mask naturally unblocks your sinuses and alleviates pressure. Where medicine can take hours to kick in, Sniff Relief gives you fast, effective relief.

No more pills. No more nasal sprays... Seriously, stop jamming things up your nose.

Sweet relief from sinus pressure and runny noses, the natural way!

The adjustable elastic strap allows the mask to stay comfortably in place while the mendable nose bridge is designed to mold around the shape of your nose giving you a snug and custom fit.

The fleece masks don’t aggravate and comes in 3 different sizes with an adjustable strap to fit comfortably.

Use the remote to adjust your Sniff Relief settings. The 4 buttons on the remote allows you to power your mask on or off, change the display settings, or increase/decrease the temperature.

We created Sniff Relief because we suffered from sinus pain and we couldn’t find anything that really worked. This is the real deal.

Sniff Relief allows you to breathe easy while performing your everyday tasks. Responds to emails, watch TV, or read a book will you get relief.

Wear it while you’re working, relaxing, or in bed. Sleep and breathe easier at night and get a full night’s rest.

Sniff Relief is especially effective for kids and children of all ages.

Everyone’s face is different and we want to get you a mask that’s the right size for you and will fit comfortably day in and day out.

As we are in the final stages of prototyping, things may change from the campaign to the final delivery of the product. Therefore, we’re going to collect sizing information after the campaign is over and have a better idea of what the final Sniff Relief measurements will be. We’ll send you instructions on how to find your correct size and find the right fit for you.

With the current prototypes that we have, these are what you can expect from the sizes.

For our initial production run, we’re going to be offering one color for that masks, Gray. If we exceed our goal, we may be able to produce another color. Help us get to our goal as quickly as possible!

         

We have been working on Sniff Relief for over 2 years and have our manufacturing all set up and ready to go. We have been in the electronic component production industry for over 20 years and feel confident in our teams ability to deliver a high quality product on time.

If our campaign is successful we will start production immediately and will have the masks to our backers in 3 months. We have been constantly iterating our product with our manufacturer and we are prepared to produce 100,000 masks per month currently.

We are at the final stages of prototyping and need your help to make Sniff Relief a reality. Your support will allow us to place our first large order with our manufacturers so that we can reduce production costs and make the masks affordable. Your pledge will allow us to get Sniff Relief in the hands of people around the world and spread the word about this natural solution to a problem so many of us suffer from.

We started Sniff Relief because we have had chronic sinusitis for years and wanted a natural solution.

00:00




















































Sniff Relief allows you to breathe easy while performing your everyday tasks. Responds to emails, watch TV, or read a book will you get relief.





Wear it while you’re working, relaxing, or in bed. Sleep and breathe easier at night and get a full night’s rest.





Sniff Relief is especially effective for kids and children of all ages.










Everyone’s face is different and we want to get you a mask that’s the right size for you and will fit comfortably day in and day out.
As we are in the final stages of prototyping, things may change from the campaign to the final delivery of the product. Therefore, we’re going to collect sizing information after the campaign is over and have a better idea of what the final Sniff Relief measurements will be. We’ll send you instructions on how to find your correct size and find the right fit for you.
With the current prototypes that we have, these are what you can expect from the sizes.










For our initial production run, we’re going to be offering one color for that masks, Gray. If we exceed our goal, we may be able to produce another color. Help us get to our goal as quickly as possible!



























      
  



















We have been working on Sniff Relief for over 2 years and have our manufacturing all set up and ready to go.  We have been in the electronic component production industry for over 20 years and feel confident in our teams ability to deliver a high quality product on time.
If our campaign is successful we will start production immediately and will have the masks to our backers in 3 months.  We have been constantly iterating our product with our manufacturer and we are prepared to produce 100,000 masks per month currently.





We are at the final stages of prototyping and need your help to make Sniff Relief a reality. Your support will allow us to place our first large order with our manufacturers so that we can reduce production costs and make the masks affordable. Your pledge will allow us to get Sniff Relief in the hands of people around the world and spread the word about this natural solution to a problem so many of us suffer from.













We started Sniff Relief because we have had chronic sinusitis for years and wanted a natural solution.

story:
Hi my name is Jessica Bourne.

I am here to ask for some funding for my mothers headstone.

My mother Leslie, lived a life of struggle and addiction. And because of that she choose to give me a better life and gave me to my family. 

Sadly in 1992 she was murdered. Strangled to death by a man.
Now because of the life she chose to live, my grandparents and family didn't have a funeral or service for her. 

At the current time she is buried in the Medowvale cemetery with NOTHING to represent her life.  I understand she made bad choices in life, but we all make mistakes and she did make the BEST choice by not allowing me to live through it all.

Every-time I go and visit her, there is NOTHING there, and it is heartbreaking.
No matter what, EVERY person deserves a funeral or some sort of service to represent the life they lived!! 

All I am looking for is a small flat granite stone with her name and birthday on it.
Something small and simple.

Please anything to help is very much appreciated.

story:
We are asking for your help for Dad's chemotherapy treatments. Each treatment is $700.00, and he needs a total of 8, along with the treatments he will need CTScans to check on the progress of shrinking the 2 tumors.

Rick has farmed all of his life in rural North Dakota. It is one of his many loves.

Because of the cancer he is  being forced to give up the farming. This spring Farm Rescue assisted us in putting the crop in.  And this fall we will also have help in taking the crops out.

With some financial help, he will be able to receive all the treatments needed, the hospital has recently notified us that payment will be needed in order to continue with the chemotherapy.

Its not only the cancer that is making it hard for him to work, he also has a  circulation blockage in his right leg, that makes it very difficult to get in and out of the tractor and trucks. 

Any amout that is donated will help us to get through this.

story:
Short Summary

It's that time of year again. Welcome to another season of Garfield High School Boys Soccer! We are proud to announce due to our fundraising efforts last year we were able to raise $5,000 and take the team all the way to the state championship final, the farthest in school history! With your contributions this year we are hoping you can help get us back to the championship and win it all this time around.

What We Need 

Last year we were able to raise more money than ever before for the soccer program, which made the managerial side of the season soooooo much easier. To all those that contributed last year, thank you for providing us with the financial freedom to run this program the way it deserves. With your help, this year can be even easier when it comes to buying uniforms, equipment, warm ups, buses and providing under privileged students with scholarships. 

The Impact

One of our first goals when we took over the program in 2010 was to create an environment that encouraged ex players and alumni to come back and coach with us. To build a GHS soccer community is why we started this and why we continue.  

We are proud to announce the community is growing and more and more alumni are coming back and want to coach!  Most of them are still in college or just graduated and have decide to dedicate their free time to a program they love and believe in. Having players come back and help out is really what makes our job worth it. 

So after covering the standard expenses for running the team (equipment, jerseys, etc.), we are hoping to use the rest of this years fundraising money to pay our ever increasing coaching staff and provide them with a little extra income for all their support and help. (The school only allocates money for three coaches but our coaching staff has grown to 6 coaches and trainers for this year!)  These young men are the heart and soul of this program and what encourages us older coaches to keep coming back every year. We consider them younger brothers, and now friends and family as they continue to grow, and would love to reimburse them for all their time, effort and dedication. Thanks Boys!


Other Ways You Can Help

The main purpose of this fundraiser is to raise money however if you would like to dedicate your time or contribute to the team in other ways we welcome you to do so. As stated earlier, it's all about building a community and soccer family. The more the family grows, so does the tradition of GHS soccer (and the smiles on our faces :) We can't wait until Garfield soccer is known around the state as a perenial power house ! Contact coach Carlos Enriquez if you have other ideas on how you may be able to impact or help the program. 

Please pass along this fundraiser to anyone you think may be interested in donating or hearing about the program. Thanks for all your support and here's to another monumental season. Go Bulldogs!!!!

story:
Hurricane Carlotta Emergency Relief Fund to Re-Establish the Zicatela Beach Towers.

I have been so busy since Hurricane Carlotta hit Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca on June 15th organizing around the clock an online campaign to raise emergency hurricane relief help for the Lifeguard Service of Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca to rebuild 8 lifeguard towers that were wiped out by Hurricane Carlotta. Oaxaca is the poorest state in Mexico and Puerto Escondido is a surfing destination in a very poor rual farm area of southern Mexico. They don't have the funds to rebuild the 8 lifeguard towers for Playa Zicatela where the surfers visit from all over the world to surf Zicatela Beach.

The international surfing community that visits Puerto Escondido is the backbone and sustenance of Puerto Escondido's economy and without the lifeguard towers re-established soon for the international surfers to keep visiting Puerto Escondido, the people of Puerto will suffer in poverty for a long time to come. The lifeguard service is the most important public service down there and they need our help to get their towers re-established as soon as possible so the internatonal surfers will start returning to stimulate Puerto's economy that was severely damaged by Hurricane Carlotta's impact.

Hurricane Carlotta was a category 2 hurricane and she wiped out a lot of homes, schools, family businesses, and all 8 of the Zicatela Beach lifeguard towers. I created and organized this fundraising campaign to help the people of Puerto and the international surfing community re-establish the Puerto Escondido Lifeguard Service Watch Towers on Zicatela Beach.

Here are some photo's taken by Urska Milavec, the lifeguard captain's wife, the morning after Carlotta hit. This is how they found the lifeguard towers.

https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.319019864855739.69484.317952628295796&type=3

 

Mission Statement:

Please help Hurricane Carlotta Emergency Relief Fund to Re-Establish the Zicatela Beach Towers keep Playa Zicatela safe for everybody by helping us fund the onsite construction costs of rebuilding the Zicatela Towers!

 

On June 15,2012 Hurricane Carlotta wiped out all 8 of the Puerto Escondido lifeguard watch towers on Playa Zicatela, a world class surfing destination. 

 

Our mission is to join together with all our combined strengths in the international surfing community to quickly rebuild the 8 Zicatela Beach Towers that were destroyed by Hurricane Carlotta. These Zicatela Beach lifeguard towers save lives in one of the most heaviest and most deadliest monster waves in the world, the Mexican Pipeline! Some of these waves have been known to reach 40-50 feet during the big wave season when the big wave surfers come from all over the world to challenge themselves and inspire others to live fearlessly and to push yourself beyond your limits.

 

Without the Zicatela Towers, visibility of surfers and swimmers is at only 40% at Zicatela Beach, and 40% is just not enough to save endangered lives when in trouble. Please help us keep Puerto's surfing community safe out there in Zicatela!

 

We need to raise $5,000 to quickly rebuild a few state of emergency towers to keep the swimmers and surfers safe at Zicatela Beach. Right now they have no lifeguard towers up and there are swimmers and surfers out there in the water without proper lifeguard watch tower protection in a dangerous pipeline and lives will be lost if we do not resurrect these lifeguard watch towers quickly.

 

Whatever you can give will help a lot! $5, $10, $20, it all helps!

 

Here is our official facebook page for the Hurricane Carlotta Emergency Relief Fund to Re-Establish the Zicatela Beach Towers.

https://www.facebook.com/ZicatelaTowers

 

There are lots of nice photo's and warm friendly people posting their blessings and valuable information on our facebook page. I also post daily updates about our progress there. Our facebook page is where I am organizing my fundraising campaign and conducting our world wide outreach to the international surfing industry to bring public awareness to our need to rebuild the Zicatela Towers as quickly as possible.

Please help us bring Hurricane Carlotta Releif Aid to help them recover from a Categroy 2 Hurricane that devistated many villages beyond the municipality of Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca Mexico.

 

Thanks for your support!

  

Here is a video of the storm report from storm experts and how serious the storm was .
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pA-sVBcSbD0

story:
D4MH 2014


1,100 MILES.  1 CAR.

3.5 BILLION MEN.

A cross-country adventure celebrating Men’s Health Week.  We’re hitting the road in an all-electric Tesla, stopping to charge and talk to men across the country about men’s health issues – from lifestyle to life-saving.

The Drive includes:

• 1,100 miles from Central Florida to NYC

• Streaming live interviews with top physicians from around the world

• Real-world talks with men about important health issues

• Supporting research and scholarships for future health leaders


WHY WE DRIVE

Men’s health issues are important but they aren’t always discussed regularly and openly. It’s important that men are aware of health issues they could face and know they’re ok to talk about with their doctor, friends and family.


TEN MEN’S HEALTH FACTS YOU MAY NOT KNOW

1. Men are 24% less likely to go to the doctor than women

2. 100,000 live with chronic testicular pain each year

3. 1 in 2 will be diagnosed with cancer in their lives

4. 230,000 will be diagnosed with prostate cancer each year

5. Men are 2x as likely to die of Melanoma

6. Men can get breast cancer! Roughly 2,000+ cases a year and 400 deaths!

7. Men’s life expectancy is almost 5 years lower than women

8. 6 million are diagnosed with depression each year. Millions more won’t talk about it.

9. Men who sit 6+ hours a day have an 18% higher chance of dying from heart disease or diabetes

10. “Macho man” culture means men are less likely to talk

about physical and mental health

Much of this is preventable with lifestyle changes and open communication. Opening this conversation is why we drive.


FOR FUN. FOR AWARENESS. FOR A CAUSE.

All proceeds of the Drive for Men’s Health will help support genetic research in men’s health conditions and will support education scholarships for future innovators at our partner institution, Florida Polytechnic University. Help us raise funds to create a better tomorrow for men and for our future engineers, doctors and scientists at Florida Polytechnic University.


WHO IS BEHIND THE WHEEL ?

The Drive for Men’s Health was created by Dr.’s Sijo Parekattil and Jamin Brahmbhatt of The PUR Clinic, Clermont, Florida. The urologists share a passion for cars, robotics and all things men’s health. The PUR Clinic specializes in male infertility, robotic vasectomy reversal, chronic testicular pain, and have performed 1,000+ robotic microsurgical procedures – more than any other center. The campaign is managed by RAMSES - The Robotic Assisted Microsurgical & Endoscopic Society - an International Society aimed at promoting evidence based development of robotic assisted platforms and tools to hopefully impact microsurgery in a meaningful and beneficial manner.


TRIP DETAILS

Thursday June 12th 7:30am to 8:30am - South Lake Hospital, Clermont, FL 

(Car Show from 7:30am to 8:30am at the Front Parking Lot of South Lake Hospital, Clermont, FL; Departure at 8:30am - Come Join Us!)

to 

Friday June 13th - 8am - TESLA Showroom, Manhattan, New York 

(In an all electric TESLA Model S)

We will only stop to recharge the electric vehicle (30-45min).  During these stops, we will take part in educational lectures and activities to raise awareness for Men’s Health. Over 40 distinguished speakers from over 30 prominent universities and institutions from all over the globe are participating.


DRIVE PATHWAY

The purpose of the Drive for Men’s Health marathon is to increase awareness of men’s health issues and to encourage men to make their health a priority.  Throughout the country, men are encouraged to get better sleep, quit smoking, be more active, eat healthy and decrease stress. As Urologists, Dr. Brahmbhatt and Dr. Parekattil plan to also increase awareness of chronic groin or testicular pain, post-vasectomy pain, post-inguinal hernia pain and male infertility.

This marathon is also geared at raising funds to help support two specific initiatives:

1) A research initiative for a novel genetic study on men with chronic groin or testicular pain, post-vasectomy pain and post-inguinal hernia pain. The PUR clinic is trying to assess if there may be any genetic abnormalities that could explain why some men suffer from these conditions.

2) A scholarship fund to cover tuition costs for students aspiring to attend the new Florida Polytechnic University, Lakeland, Florida. This is a one of kind engineering school geared at developing engineers for the future. The school uses industry and medical partnerships/internships as part of an immersive real-life training model so that all graduates would be engaged in solving current day problems during their entire educational experience. For more info visit: http://floridapolytechnic.org


All raised funds will be distributed as follows:

50% - For the men’s health genetic study initiative

50% - For scholarships to Florida Polytechnic University


ABOUT JAMIN BRAHMBHATT, MD & SIJO PAREKATTIL, MD

Both physicians are passionate about men’s health and providing the highest standard of urologic care to their patients. They have completed dual fellowships in robotic microsurgery and infertility. They are active members of many local and national healthcare organizations.  They frequently speak at local, national, and international events educating the public on urologic diseases, male infertility, chronic groin or testicular pain, sexual medicine and low testosterone. They have published multiple books and journal articles on their research interests. For more info about both physicians visit: http://www.mypur.org

For further info about this campaign:

Phone: 747.777.6146

Email: info@ramsesweb.org

Website: http://www.drive4menshealth.com


Event Sponsors:

story:
How did Chrome Fitness come to be?

My name is Marcy Kerr, and I am the owner of Chrome Fitness, LLC. I'm dedicated to improving the fitness and quality of life for women all around me. I have my BS in Kinesiology from IU, and will have my MS in Kinesiology from IU this coming May. Those are just letters behind my name, let me tell you what my real passion is.

Since 2010, I have been working in the group fitness scene, and I love it! I first started teaching Zumba® and line dancing, while also personal training in community outreach wellness programs. In 2011, I had the unique opportunity to learn the art of fitness pole dancing. I began instructing fitness pole dancing just shortly thereafter. Through just over two years of instructing this, I developed intense relationships with the women in my classes. They too have developed a sense of sisterhood, and we often talk about the future, knowing that we will be together for years to come. Working with clients on such a personal level allows me to help improve their entire life - not just what happens in the pole class. We develop comprehensive wellness programs so that they are healthy physically, emotionally, and mentally. And yes, all of this stems from dancing around, up, and over a chrome pole.

 

What is Chrome Fitness?

Chrome Fitness is a fitness pole dancing studio in Carmel, IN. It is revolutionizing the way women think about fitness, wellness, strength, and confidence. Here we focus on complete health. There are many levels of fitness pole dancing, but each requires a certain level of flexibility, strength, and endurance. Consequently, so does leading a healthy life! For that reason, we supplement our pole classes with other dance and fitness classes such as Zumba®, chair dance, yoga and bootcamp.

 

Chrome Fitness specializes in creating a strong sisterhood across all ages, shapes, sizes, and fitness levels of the clientele. This is what makes the studio unique.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $4,300 to cover the costs of 9-10 poles & shipping, 4 safety mats, 5 suspension trainers, 2 BOSU's, and 2 pull up bars. 
  • Our perks will benefit you directly!
  • These funds will be used for any and all equipment needs that can be funded. If we are so blessed to exceed our goal, Chrome Fitness will continue to buy equipment.

 

The Impact

This campaign is to support the opening of Chrome Fitness, by helping to cover the most important startup cost - our equipment. This campaign will allow us to purchase the best quality poles, safety mats for a high mat:student ratio, cross training equipment such as suspension trainers, BOSU's, and strength equipment. Having the best equipment allows our students to reach their true potential!

Chrome Fitness will be using the industry leader in dance poles, X-Pole, to purchase 45mm spin poles. These poles will give the best advantage to our students in their learning progress. The safety mats allow for comfort when learning new tricks. The suspension trainers will allow students to cross train to improve core strength and balance, while having the ability to train their muscles through the full range of motion.

By contributing to this campaign, you will help a small business owner in her first endeavor. These funds are used for equipment that everyone walking into the studio will use and benefit from. There is a personal interest in this campaign from current pole students and those that are waiting anxiously for the doors of Chrome Fitness to open.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • With or without a financial contribution, you can help Chrome Fitness succeed! Please share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and through email to all your closest friends and relatives.
  • Not in the area? Make sure you let your central Indiana friends and family know that their is a great fitness pole dancing studio opening in their area!
story_txt:
How did Chrome Fitness come to be?My name is Marcy Kerr, and I am the owner of Chrome Fitness, LLC. I'm dedicated to improving the fitness and quality of life for women all around me. I have my BS in Kinesiology from IU, and will have my MS in Kinesiology from IU this coming May. Those are just letters behind my name, let me tell you what my real passion is. Since 2010, I have been working in the group fitness scene, and I love it! I first started teaching Zumba® and line dancing, while also personal training in community outreach wellness programs. In 2011, I had the unique opportunity to learn the art of fitness pole dancing. I began instructing fitness pole dancing just shortly thereafter. Through just over two years of instructing this, I developed intense relationships with the women in my classes. They too have developed a sense of sisterhood, and we often talk about the future, knowing that we will be together for years to come. Working with clients on such a personal level allows me to help improve their entire life - not just what happens in the pole class. We develop comprehensive wellness programs so that they are healthy physically, emotionally, and mentally. And yes, all of this stems from dancing around, up, and over a chrome pole. What is Chrome Fitness?Chrome Fitness is a fitness pole dancing studio in Carmel, IN. It is revolutionizing the way women think about fitness, wellness, strength, and confidence. Here we focus on complete health. There are many levels of fitness pole dancing, but each requires a certain level of flexibility, strength, and endurance. Consequently, so does leading a healthy life! For that reason, we supplement our pole classes with other dance and fitness classes such as Zumba®, chair dance, yoga and bootcamp.  Chrome Fitness specializes in creating a strong sisterhood across all ages, shapes, sizes, and fitness levels of the clientele. story:
Our Mission

As Triumph Freerunning, we encourage the pursuit of knowledge, discipline, and a healthy lifestyle in the parkour and fitness community. Parkour and Freerunning interest is expanding rapidly across the U.S, subsequently the demand for an outlet for this is also expanding. Triumph Freerunning will provide this original outlet in Chesterfield, MO, which is unique to this area (Being the only parkour gym in Missouri). 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need close to 15000 dollars to finish the construction, buy foam blocks for our crash pit, safety mats, black mat flooring, and the ninja warrior warped wall.
  • We have some unique, and really cool perks if you donate and help us make every kids dream come true. Perks ranging from free T-Shirts, to free monthly memberships, your name painted into our mural, and so on. 
  • If we do not manage to reach our campaign goal, all of the funds raised will go directly to the finishing construction, flooring and our foam pit.

You're The Impact

By donating to our cause, you are helping a facility with great intention's and a great community. Building a facility where everyone feels comfortable is many peoples dream coming true. Ranging from young kids, teens, and even adults. And By donating, you're receiving some really cool perks.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you cannot help financially, you can always share our video around, and even use the IndieGoGo share tools right here on this website. We appreciate your concern and everything you do. 

    www.triumphfreerunning.com

    Gym Location - 749 Spirit of St.Louis Blvd Chesterfield MO, 63005

    CEO/Founder  Ryan Gregory / (314)-598-6932 

      And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

Team:  Andrew Squires, Bryce Yamasaki, Colin Clark

We created a fast easy convenient method to apply the season to your cast iron cookware. Our design incorporates a small, handled, seasoning device that rests in a spring-loaded seasoning holding cup. The chef’s favorite seasoning mix is kept in the ceramic mold and the replaceable pad, shaped to fit the contour of the cast iron pan, is always ready with the perfect amount of seasoning that can be quickly, easily, conveniently, and mess-free applied in seconds.

Cast iron users need an innovative solution to a process that we've been doing for years and years.  After cooking with cast iron cookware each person needs to wash, dry, and season after each use.  We season because it preserves that hard, smooth, impermeable non-stick surface that we all love.  Until now the only solution to seasoning and wiping our pans has been with "paper towels" and trusted oil, shortening, salt, pepper, or (whichever family secret you are putting to use).  

Our product is unique and the very first of it's kind. A modern dish that sits next to your stove, each time after washing/drying your iron pan, an oil pad is always ready for you to conveniently season. Need more oil? Push down on the round handle and the replaceable pad is coated in oil, wipe your pan, set it back for the next use.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Help us help every cast iron user  
  • No burning your fingers
  • Faster and more convenient seasoning
  • U.S. Manufacturing and Assembly
  • No more paper towel
  • Conserves oil
  • We need your help to launch, market, manufacture, distribute, and make the seasoning process more convenient for all cast iron users!  

Challenges

  • We are the first people to develop this type of product
  • Quality manufacturing
  • Prototype development
  • Product testing

Other Ways You Can Help

Visit us on Facebook and please share our campaign

story:
• Cheryl Redfern, a recently retired RN working in the line of additions, Reiki Master, sound healer and Biosonic Repatterning Educator. Mother of three, Grandmother of three. 
  • Elizabeth Mueller, Kriya Yoga Instructor, Reiki Practitioner, Sound Massage Practitioner, Biosonic Repatterning Educator, Mother of two, Nana to one.

  • We offer sound healing to all who are interested, regardless of their financial situation. Therefore, we ask for funding to cover expenses as we expand sound healing awareness thru seminars workshop and meditations. This includes production and marketing cost of our first professional sound healing CD. 

  • These contributions will enable us to reach out to a wider population. Expanding the awareness of sound healing to many others. 


What We Need & What You Get

  • A minimum of $3000.00 would enable us to cover the cost of production and marketing of the CD.  Our hopes and dreams would be to have enough money to cover the cost of booking venues for events in our immediate area.
  • For those who contribute $25.00 they will receive a downloadable copy of our new CD. We would love to offer a CD (hard copy), to all who contribute $100.00, and for those who contribute over $500.00 we will offer a CD and a sound healing treatment (in Harrison Hot Springs BC).  
  • If our goal isn't reach we will use the funds acquired toward the production of the CD recording.

The Impact

  • We believe this is an incredibly powerful healing modality, it needs far more exposure and we intend to help educate all who are curious. 
  • In the past 5 years we have studied with Dr John Beaulieu, receiving our certification as a  Biosonics Repatterning Educator. Along with this, we have studied the healing power of the voice with Silvia Nakkach, through Dr. Mitchell Gaynor we have learned the power of sound healing as a complementary medicine in the practice of Oncology for the reduction of symptoms of chemotherapy and radiation. Tom Kenyon who is one of the most respected sound healers in the world, we owe deep gratitude and humble respect.
    Theresa Schroeder-Sheker and her Chalice of Repose project has inspired us to offer sound healing to those who are making their transition and as well as giving support to their family and  loved ones.  
Testimonials:    
“I experienced their workshop in my place of work, and I was happily surprised at how much deep relaxation I was able to achieve through their facilitation.  I left the room feeling very grounded and clear-headed.  I wish that experience on anyone”!

  • Amanda Spear, BA Student Services Manager| BCIT Student Association

    “I thought you should know that I've been listening to your CD for about the last 5 nights just before I go to bed. It's actually working!

    I had a CT scan done on my head as I was having headaches daily for a few weeks. Anyway, it came out fine but they did discover an inflamed nerve that was causing the headaches/earaches.

    Anyway I'm taking Naproxen and it's helping, but I think your music is doing even more!! I find I'm having restful sleeps and not thinking of anything!! It's pretty crazy how the chimes, etc. sound just as if you're standing over me!! Thank you for the CD! I've given out the 3 extra you gave me”.

    Brenda, Kelowna

    “Cheryl and Liz’s amazing Sound Baths, set in the peacefulness of Liz's Spirit Yoga Studio were a magical combination for the weekend retreat into self. I came away with insights on my continued “road to self-discovery”.

    Judy, Harrison Hot Springs

    “Well, stating the obvious…fantastic journey!!!

    Cheryl, you had so lovingly told all of us, how happy you were that we were there; well tenfold at both of you…as we wouldn't be there but for the two of you.

    The sound is still, as I write to you, resounding in my ‘cells’. One would commonly think in their head, but no – it has gone cellular. My body is still responding.

    The play of sound, within the play-of-dance the two of you do, is not unlike the intermingling nuances found in the best of wine. Whether it is received from the bowls, drums, gongs – each at their own time, or the specific combinations you intuitively play – are felt in the deepest part of my being, from head to toe. There are so many times that the particular tones are played and my-self go out, somewhere – then back.

    At the end of the first session; I didn't get up right away because my third eye was wide open and looking face to face with an eagle, up close and personal. I feel renewed, and relaxed – but it goes much deeper than the physical – to a place where there are no words”.

    Diane A.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Your help is valuable, please spread the word to family and friends. Like us on facebook,  send blessings and love.
  • Also use the Indiegogo share links. 

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Imagine a place where survivors of childhood sexual abuse (CSA) can reclaim the joy of childhood. Imagine a place where they can find confidence through the power of choice, find healing through the power of art and find hope through the power of community. Imagine Camp CADI!  

Camp CADI is an amazing camp for girls ages 8-18 that have been traumatized by childhood sexual abuse.  Each year we hold a week long camp that gives the girls an escape and a place to heal from their trauma.  By pairing art and music therapy, story telling, camp activities, and traditional therapies we try to teach the girls that they are not to blame; and what happened to them does not define who they are.

Sadly, like most non-profit organizations we have run into the problem of little to no funding.  While getting organized for Camp CADI 2012 we have realized the price of camp has outreached the means of our organization.  Most of the girls and their families do not have the means to pay for camp themselves, and we have never denied any girl from experiencing the wonderful benefits of our camp due to money.  This is where you come in, we need your help to save Camp CADI 2012.  Any donation will help, both small and big!  If you would like to help save the lives of childhood sexual abuse survivors, and give them a chance to take back their childhood please donate!

story:
Short Summary

Hello. My name is Holly E. Mullin. I have been working in alternative therapies for almost 20yrs and together with my partner, run Breathe Detox Retreats, in Devon, UK. 
We are passionate about health and wellness. We believe that every body deserves treatment and an opportunity to learn about "how to" be in optimum health, regardless of age, race, class or occupation. 
We also believe the body is a living organism and has an innate well of wisdom, an in-built survival mechanism which means it WANTS to live. We just need to give it the right environment. From there anything and everything is possible. Regeneration IS the goal and a willingness to be well is the key.
That is why we want to set up this not-for-profit, on donation only, wellness and retreat centre. But we need YOUR help.
An opportunity has arisen to own a large house in Devon, UK and we need a large deposit to get a mortgage. 
This is a not-for-profit community project which will not only offer people at cost alternative therapies, detox lifestyle and wellness education, but also jobs for many local therapists and an opportunity for global wellness guides to teach and offer retreats here. 
We also intend to use the building and surrounding land to provide low carbon footprint and sustainability: Creating a market garden to grow greens and organic vegetables for our freshly pressed daily juices as well as buying locally sourced and "happy" produced for an on sight whole foods cafe. Using and installing green energy sources for power and heating on site. 
This is potentially the first project of it's kind in the UK and an opportunity to help fund a leading and cutting edge health and wellness project. It is the dawning of the new with the intention being set on "PREVENTION is better than cure". It is the only way that we will thrive and survive as a species. This is the way and NOW is the time.  
The ever-present NOW. 
Whatever you can give. However big or small. I do hope you will join us. Ready to serve, we the people.

What We Need & What You Get

We need at least £100,000.
This will breakdown as £50,000 as a deposit on a mortgage and £50,000 for fixtures and fittings, beds, bedding, furniture etc. As well as a hot-tub and sauna. 
Your contribution isn't an investment and it definitely isn't a give away. It's a purchase. You are buying into a stay at our prestigious new wellness centre, once we are open. This is an investment in YOUR health. An opportunity to to learn about cutting edge research into the nature of health, wellness, stress, how are bodies hold it, how to release it and how to let it go. 
Perks:
If you contribute up to £50 you will receive an invitation to our open day and grand opening. 
If you contribute £50 - £100 you will receive a one night stay and complimentary treatment. 
If you contribute £100 - £200 you will receive a two night stay, complimentary treatment and breakfast. 
If you contribute £200 - £400 you will receive a three night stay, complimentary treatment, dinner and breakfast.
If you contribute £500 - £1000 you will receive a five night detox retreat including daily juices, yoga, meditation, talks, complimentary massage, kinesiology session, nutritional consultation, presentations and workshops.
If you contribute more than £1000 you are welcome to stay for our entire 21 day awakening medicine programme includes all of the above plus a daily session with Holly. 
If we don't reach our entire goal in the first setting, we will use the money to put towards the mortgage and continue funding for the set up in stages. The reason we need it so quickly is because the property is being auctioned on 15th August, 2014. 

The Impact

This campaign is SO important right now as it's the only project of its kind being set up at this time. Up until now alternative health and complimentary treatments and therapies have really only been for the people with a disposable income. 

Often we have people asking us if we could offer them a place on our retreats for far less than half the normal asking price, because they know how much they would benefit from what we offer. However, because of the nature of our five star luxury retreats, our overheads are so high we cannot give rooms away at that price. 

Put it this way. Even I could not afford to come to my own retreat. I just don't have that kind of disposable income. I could save, yes. But if we have a place which is open year round and pay the mortgage for a month, what we pay for a week where we are now, then we can offer our services at a greatly reduced rate. 

So, if you are interested in YOUR health and well-being and the health and well-being of the PLANET and our species at large, then please donate. This is only one of the first small stepping stones towards a brighter future for everyone, yet it is a very important step. From a firm foundation we can grow and offer more. 

We thank you in advance for trusting us with your donation to supporting the wider global community. 

Risks & Challenges

Of course we understand that this is a big project. And it will take a lot of helping hands to see it come to fruition. We will be requiring many hours of voluntary (wo)man power, so if that is all you can offer at this time, then the gift of your time will be greatly received and we will be asking for that in due course. 

The first step is in winning the auction, which is obviously the first and most important step. The property is likely to cost MORE than the guide price of £500,000 and I expect we are not the only people who want it! So we may need more than the estimated £50,000 towards the mortgage. 

We are a team of at least 10 with friends and family AND a very strong will to see this happen. Prayer and intention are everything and we also have a great power of that behind us. If all you can offer at this time is prayer, than that too is greatly received. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Like I said above, if you can't help financially by offering a monetary gift, please do still contribute in whatever way you can. PLEASE like and share this post far and wide so we get as much interest and hype around it as we can, with an intention to create something that everyone can benefit from, no matter how much or how little you have. We may even be able to offer bursaries at some point, god-willing.
    And, of course your hand power, prayer, visualisation, dream weaving and intention is such a gift and humbly received for a project with the magnitude of this one.
    God bless us, every one!
