Die sogenannte Black Bone Disease ist mit weniger als 100 Patienten in Großbritannien und knapp 1000 diagnostizierten Fällen weltweit eine sehr seltene Erkrankung.  Wir brauchen Ihre Hilfe, um Patienten aus ganz Europa zusammen zu bringen, damit möglichst viele Daten gesammelt werden können, um das beste Alter für den Beginn einer Behandlung mit Nitisinon zu ermitteln.


Was ist die “Black Bone Disease”?
Die "Black Bone Disease“ ist auch bekannt als Alkaptonurie oder AKU. Es ist eine genetische Erkrankung, die durch eine Ansammlung von Säuren im Körper verursacht wird, wodurch die Knochen und andere Gewebe angegriffen werden, indem sie schwarz und brüchig werden. Das führt zu schwerwiegenden Gelenkschädigungen und kann sogar eine Herzerkrankung zur Folge haben.
Die Alkaptonurie war die erste genetische Erkrankung, die – vor mehr als 110 Jahren – entdeckt wurde. Für diese Krankheit gibt es bis dato keine zugelassene Behandlung. Wir möchten das ändern.
Über uns
Wir sind die AKU-Gesellschaft, eine wohltätige Vereinigung, die Patienten mit Alkaptonurie unterstützt. Als Patientengruppierung sind wir für unsere Patienten da und arbeiten sehr eng mit ihnen zusammen. Da Alkaptonurie eine sehr seltene Erkrankung ist, arbeiten wir hart daran, bei der Identifizierung der Patienten zu helfen und diese mit den notwendigen Informationen über ihre Krankheit zu versorgen.
Unser Ziel ist es, das Versorgungsniveau und die Lebensqualität aller Patienten mit Alkaptonurie zu verbessern. Die Unterstützung der Patienten besteht zum Großteil darin, die Forschung voranzutreiben. Wir wollen eine Behandlung finden, die für die Patienten funktioniert. Durch unsere Beteiligung an der Forschung und den klinischen Studien wird sichergestellt, dass die Patienten im Fokus stehen und dass die Studien immer zum Nutzen der Patienten durchgeführt werden.

Die Geschichte von Rosie

Rosie ist eine Studentin Anfang zwanzig. Sie wurde mit Alkaptonurie diagnostiziert, als sie ein Baby war. Ihr Vater, Ian, ist Allgemeinmediziner und Rosie tritt in seine Fußstapfen, indem sie Medizin studiert. Trotz seines medizinischen Hintergrundes war Ian sehr beunruhigt, als Rosie erstmalig im Alter von 18 Monaten mit Alkaptonurie diagnostiziert wurde.
“Als wir die Diagnose erhielten, wurden wir mehr oder weniger im Kreis geschickt, da es zu dieser Zeit noch kein Internet, keine AKU-Gesellschaft und keine Behandlung gab“, so Rosies Vater Ian.
Er wusste, dass sich ohne Hilfe bei seiner Tochter im Laufe ihres Lebens langsam Gelenks- und Wirbelsäulenprobleme entwickeln würden, was zu Gelenksoperationen und schwerer Behinderung führen würde. Die noch schlimmere Probleme einer Herzerkrankung stellen eine weitere Befürchtung dar.



Glücklicherweise haben wir jetzt ein Arzneimittel, das verhindern könnte, dass es bei Rosie und anderen Patienten wie sie jemals zu irgendwelchen Behinderungen durch die Alkaptonurie kommen wird. Dieses Arzneimittel heißt Nitisinon.
“Für mich und andere Patienten wie mich wäre es unglaublich wichtig zu wissen, wann der beste Zeitpunkt ist, um mit Nitisinon zu beginnen, damit die schwerwiegendere Erscheinungsbilder der Erkrankung, einschließlich Arthritis, verhindert werden können.“ Rosie, junge Alkaptonurie-Patientin
Die Geschichte bisher 
Derzeit helfen wir bei der Finanzierung einer großen,europaweiten klinischen Studie zur Untersuchung eines viel versprechenden Arzneimittels zur Behandlung der Alkaptonurie. Dieses Arzneimittel heißt Nitisinon und, wenn es im richtigen Alter gegeben wird, könnte es sämtliche Schädigungen, die durch diese Erkrankung verursacht werden, verhindern. Das würde das Leben von Patienten mit Alkaptonurie verändern.
Ihrer Großzügigkeit verdanken wir unseren bisherigen Erfolg. 2013 starteten wir unsere erste sogenannte Crowdfunding-Kampagne, Cure Black Bone Disease, auf Indiegogo. Diese Kampagne war ein unglaublicher Erfolg und wir verdanken es Ihnen, dass wir so viele Patienten rekrutieren und unterstützen konnten. 
Mit Ihrer Hilfe konnten wir die Reise- und Aufenthaltskosten der Patienten abdecken und ihnen vor, während und nach jeder Kontrolle kontinuierlich unterstützen. Gerade haben wir  die Rekrutierung unserer großen Studie, an der mehr als 135 Patienten teilnehmen, abgeschlossen. Bei solch einer seltenen Erkrankung ist das ein großartiges Ereignis!
Es gibt jedoch noch eine Frage, die wir unbedingt lösen müssen. Was ist das beste Alter, um mit diesem Arzneimittel zu beginnen? Wird es zu früh gegeben, könnte es möglicherweise  schädigende Nebenwirkungen bei den Kindern verursachen. Wird es zu spät gegeben, könnte die mit der Alkaptonurie verbundene Schädigung bereits eingesetzt haben. Damit befasst sich die nächste Phase unserer Forschung.
Die nächste Phase
Alkaptonurie beeinträchtigt die Patienten ein Leben lang. Bereits im frühen Alter hinterlässt der dunkel gefärbte Harn Flecken in den Windeln. Die Kinder können auch dunklen Ohrenschmalz und dunklen Schweiß haben. Solche Symptome erscheinen harmlos im jungen Alter und die Kinder sind oft vollkommen gesund.


Jess ist die Mutter eines kleinen Jungen mit Alkaptonurie. Sie merkte erstmals, dass mit ihrem Sohn etwas nicht stimmte, als sie seinen dunkelrot verfärbten Harn sah. Nach mehreren Arztbesuchen und Nachforschungen im Internet ließ sie ihren kleinen Sohn auf Alkaptonurie testen. Obwohl er jetzt gesund ist, macht sich Jess darüber Sorgen, wie die Krankheit in Zukunft sein Leben beeinträchtigen könnte.

"Für mich als Mutter ist es wirklich schwierig, zu wissen, dass unser kleiner Sohn diese Krankheit hat. Er ist ein sehr glückliches und gesundes vierjähriges Kind, aber eine nicht sichtbare Schädigung könnte bei ihm bereits eingesetzt haben, und deshalb ist es so wichtig, das richtige Alter für den Behandlungsbeginn mit diesem Arzneimittel herauszufinden.“
Leider werden die Symptome mit der Zeit schlimmer.Als junge Erwachsene bekommen die Patienten Gelenkschmerzen, die zunehmend schlimmer werden. Es kann binnen kurzer Zeit zu lähmenden Rücken- und Gelenkschmerzen kommen, die dazu führen, dass viele Patienten ihre Arbeit aufgeben müssen. Ältere Patienten brauchen unter Umständen Operationen, um ihre gebrochene Gelenke zu ersetzen oder zu festigen. Mit der Zeit werden die Patienten schwer behindert.
Unsere Forschungsteams wissen noch nicht genau, wie sich die Krankheit im Laufe des Lebens eines Patienten verändert. Deshalb müssen wir die Finanzierung für SOFIA, eine neue klinische Studie, sicherstellen. Diese Studie wird Patienten aus einer Auswahl von verschiedenen Altersgruppen miteinander vergleichen und hat das Ziel, die Krankheit besser zu verstehen und das beste Alter für den Therapiebeginn zu ermitteln.

"Es ist wirklich äußerst wichtig, dass wir herausfinden, in welchem Alter mit Nitisinon begonnen werden soll, damit die Patienten keine dieser beeinträchtigenden Symptome entwickeln." Ann, AKU Patientin
Für unsere SOFIA-Studie werden Patienten aus ganz Europa rekrutiert. Unsere Forscher werden die verschiedenen Gruppen vergleichen, um den tatsächlichen Beginn der Schädigung zu ermitteln. Sie werden dazu verschiedene Hilfsmittel anwenden, wie zum Beispiel eine Beurteilung des Gangbildes, Entnahme von Blut-, Harn- und Ohrknorpelproben.
Diese Arbeit sollte ihnen helfen, zu erkennen, ob bei jungen Patienten eine signifikante Schädigung vorliegt, die nicht sichtbar ist. Das ist sehr wichtig – wenn wir das Arzneimittel früh genug geben, können wir die Patienten möglichweise davor schützen, jemals irgendwelche der schmerzhaften Symptome der AKU zu entwickeln. Durch eine Anwendung im richtigen Alter können wir die Auswirkungen von potenziellen Nebenwirkungen bei heranwachsenden Kindern minimieren.
"Wenn wir wüssten, dass er zum richtigen Zeitpunkt ein Arzneimittel bekommen würde, das den Beginn einer solchen schrecklichen Erkrankung verhindern könnte, wäre das sehr erfreulich. Wir wären überglücklich." Jess, Mutter eines AKU-Patienten

Wir brauchen Ihre Hilfe
Alkaptonurie ist sehr selten und wir brauchen Ihre Hilfe, um Patienten aus ganz Europa zusammen zu bringen, damit möglichst viele Daten gesammelt werden können, um das beste Alter für den Beginn einer Behandlung mit Nitisinon zu ermitteln.
Hier kommen Sie ins Spiel
Für die Finanzierung der medizinischen Arbeit haben wir bereits Geld gesammelt und jetzt geht es um einen Spendenbetrag von 30.000 $ für unsere Arbeit zur Unterstützung der Patienten. Damit werden wir die Studienteilnahme von etwa 15 Patienten voll unterstützen können.
Die ideale Patientenanzahl für diese Studie ist 32. Mit 30.000 $ können wir die Finanzierung und Unterstützung von nahezu der Hälfte der Patienten, die wir für unsere Studie brauchen, übernehmen. Durch Ihre Hilfe können wir Folgendes sicherstellen:
•Abdeckung der Reisekosten von Patienten aus ganz Europa zum Studienzentrum in Liverpool, Großbritannien.
•Abdeckung der Reisekosten für Betreuer(innen) von Patienten, die nicht allein reisen können. Viele Patienten haben Probleme beim Gehen und brauchen die Hilfe eines/einer Betreuer(in).
•Unterstützung unserer Arbeit in der AKU-Gesellschaft. Als Patientengruppe werden wir die Hauptanlaufstelle für die Patienten sein, da wir ihre Arztbesuche vereinbaren und sie nachher betreuen.
•Finanzierung der Kommunikation mit den Patienten, wodurch wir den direkten Kontakt mit jedem Patienten, der an SOFIA teilnehmen kann, herstellen können. Die Patienten teilen uns mit, dass es für sie beruhigend ist, jemanden zu haben, den sie kontaktieren können, um ihre Anliegen zu besprechen und um Rat zu fragen. Dies inkludiert auch die Übersetzungskosten für Patienten, die nicht Englisch sprechen.
•Organisation eines Informationsworkshops. Dieses Patiententreffen wird Patienten, die an SOFIA interessiert sind, Gelegenheit geben, mehr über die Studie zu erfahren und herauszufinden, warum sie wichtig ist.
Mit Ihrer Hilfe können wir die Alkaptonurie ein für allemal heilen, bevor es zu spät ist.
Wie Sie uns sonst helfen können:
•Erzählen Sie Ihrer Familie und Freunden über uns!
•Verwenden Sie die Indiegogo-Sharetools – tweet, like, G+ oder E-Mail – am Anfang der Seite, um unsere Kampagne bei Ihren Freunden bekannt zu machen. So kann Indiegogo uns wieder erkennen und das kann bedeuten, dass wir es auf Ihre Startseite schaffen.
•Kommentieren Sie unsere Kampagne, um auf uns aufmerksam zu machen.
•Sprechen Sie in Ihrem Blog oder auf Ihrer Facebook-Seite über die Kampagne.
•Teilen Sie Ihre Geschichten über Alkaptonurie mit uns. Wir sind immer auf der Suche nach neuen Updates und Bildern!
Unsere Anreize:
Ihr Name auf unserer Website
Wenn Sie sich mit einer Spende von nur 12 $ (8£) an unserem Anliegen beteiligen, veröffentlichen wir als Dank für Ihre Hilfe Ihren Namen auf unserer Website. Zusätzlich senden wir Ihnen ein öffentlich zugängliches Dankeschön über Twitter, wenn Sie uns Ihre Twitter-Identifikation bekannt geben! Sehen Sie sich diese Danksagungen der letzten Kampagne an!



Autoaufkleber & Dankesbrief
Für eine Spende von nur 24 $(16£) senden wir Ihnen Ihren eigenen Fensteraufkleber der Kampagne zu. Bringen Sie diesen in Ihrem Auto an oder kleben Sie ihn voller Stolz an das Vorderfenster Ihres Hauses, um anderen Menschen zu zeigen, dass Sie unser Anliegen unterstützen und ihnen zu sagen, wie auch sie uns unterstützen können! Sie erhalten von uns auch einen Dankesbrief und zusätzlich wird Ihr Name auf unserer Website veröffentlicht.

Armband & Dankesbrief
Für eine Spende von nur 48 $(31£) erhalten Sie ein Armband der AKU-Gesellschaft mit dem Text „AKU-Gesellschaft heilt die weltweit erste genetische Erkrankung“. Tragen Sie es voller Stolz, um anderen Menschen zu zeigen, wie Sie mithelfen, die weltweit erste genetische Erkrankung zu heilen! Zusammen mit dem Armband bekommen Sie einen Dankesbrief unserer Kampagnenteams. Zusätzlich wird als Dank Ihr Name auf unserer Webseite veröffentlicht.




Persönliches Telefongespräch als Dankeschön 
Für eine Spende von nur 72 $(47£) wird Sie jemand von unserem Team anrufen, um Ihnen persönlich für Ihren Beitrag zu unserer Kampagne zu danken. Das ist Ihre Gelegenheit, mit einem von unseren Vorkämpfern zu sprechen und noch ausführlicher in Erfahrung zu bringen, wo Ihr Geld eingesetzt wird und warum es so wertvoll ist. Zusätzlich wird als Dank Ihr Name auf unserer Website veröffentlicht.


Stoffbeutel mit Sanduhr
Für eine Spende von 100 $(65£) erhalten Sie einen unserer Stoffbeutel mit Sanduhr! Diese eleganten Beutel mit limitierter Auflage zeigen auf einer Seite unsere Originalsanduhr. Ihre Freunde werden Sie beneiden, wenn Sie mit diesem Beutel über die Schuler einkaufen gehen. Als Dank können wir auch Ihren Namen auf unserer Website veröffentlichen.



Telefongespräch mit einem AKU-Wissenschaftler 
Für eine Spende von 200 $(130£) erhalten Sie ein Telefongespräch mit einem unserer AKU-Wissenschaftler. Nützen Sie die Gelegenheit, diesen Experten zur bahnbrechenden Forschung der AKU zu befragen. Als Bonus wird auch Ihr Name zum Dank auf unserer Website erscheinen.


Eine schöne Schreibtisch-Sanduhr 
Unser neuester Spendenanreiz! Für eine Spende von 500 $(330£) erhalten Sie eine schöne Schreibtisch-Sanduhr als Erinnerung daran, wie Sie unsere Forschung der Alkaptonurie finanziell unterstützt haben, bevor es zu spät war.Wie die Sanduhr aussieht, sehen Sie erst, wenn Sie spenden, denn sie ist unser Geheimbonus!


Besuch im Labor für Ganganalyse
Das bietet Ihnen die einmalige Gelegenheit, unserem Hi-Tech-Labor für Ganganalyse in Liverpool einen exklusiven Besuch abzustatten. Für die Ganganalyse unserer Patienten werden spezielle Kameras und Lichtreflektoren verwendet, um zu bewerten, wie die Patienten gehen und stehen. Das ist ein äußerst wichtiger Teil der von uns finanzierten Forschung, der uns helfen wird, zu verstehen, welche Auswirkungen die Alkaptonurie im Laufe der Zeit auf die Gelenke eines Patienten hat. Für eine Spende von 500 $(330£) können Sie die Forschung im Einsatz erleben und diese bahnbrechende Technik in der Praxis sehen. Die Kosten der Führung werden vollständig von uns getragen, Ihre Reise müssen Sie aber selbst organisieren.



Führung durch die BBC-Studios 
Für die Spende von unglaublichen 1500 $(1000 £) halten wir für Sie einen echten Höhepunkt bereit. Sie bekommen eine Führung durch die BBC-Fernsehstudios in London und werden dabei begleitet von einem ehemaligen BBC-Moderator! Geben Sie sich diese echte Insider-Erfahrung und schauen Sie sich die Studios an, aus denen Sie seit Jahren ihre Lieblingsprogramme empfangen. Die Kosten der Führung werden vollständig von uns getragen, Ihre Reise müssen Sie aber selbst organisieren.

story:
Le 11 juillet dernier, Mathieu a été hospitalisé après avoir été diagnostiqué avec le syndrome Guillain-Barré. Ce syndrome rare entraine une paralysie progressive du corps, mais 80% des personnes se rétablissent après une longue réadaptation. Travailleur autonome, nous ne savons pas encore pour combien de temps Mathieu sera dans l'impossibilité de travailler. L'argent amassé servira à payer ses frais de subsistance pour les mois à venir.

On the 11th of July, Mathieu was diagnosed with the Guillain-Barré syndrome. This rare syndrome causes progressive paralysis of the body, but 80% of people recover after a long rehabilitation. Self-employed, we do not yet know for how long Mathieu will be unable to work. The money raised will be used to pay his living expenses for the coming months.

story:
Català aquí


Español aqui


Club Joventut Badalona

Founded in 1930, Club Joventut Badalona is one of the most prestigious basketball teams in Europe and in the FIBA basketball. Europe’s champion and champion of the Spanish National League (ACB) in several occasions, beyond its titles, the “Penya”, name which the club is known by the basketball family, it’s also recognized as one of the main contributors forming young players around the world. 

What is #joventutmodel?

Currently more than 500 kids and young people are formed every year in the basketball school and in the club’s youth categories. All of them aspire to become basketball stars, such as Ricky Rubio, current PG of the Minnesota Timberwolves and drafted 5 in 2009; Rudy Fernández (Portland Trailblazers 2008-2011 and 2015 Euroleague champion) or Raúl López (Utah Jazz, 2003-2005). But above all, they learn the sports values through the educational and formative labor that the Joventut model represents from its foundation 85 years ago. 

What are you contributing to?

“We believe in Basketball, we save #joventutmodel” is a campaign aimed at getting the necessary funds to maintain this club’s model and its human and social formative labor, and avoid its disappearance. All the supports received from those who believe in basketball as the Club Joventut Badalona does will be used to complete the club’s budget dedicated to form young players, diminished in the last few years due to an unfavorable economic context. 

If you believe in the essence of this sport. If you want to contribute saving the Joventut model. Donate, click one of the options at the right column and join us at #joventutmodel. 

They're talking about our campaign

  • joventutmodel@joventutbadalona.com
  • Our Facebook Page
  • Our Twitter account


Català aquí

ANAR A L'INICI



Club Joventut Badalona

Fundat l’any 1930, el Club Joventut Badalona és un dels clubs de bàsquet amb més prestigi i historia d’Europa i del bàsquet FIBA. Campió d’Europa i diverses vegades campió de la prestigiosa lliga espanyola de bàsquet (ACB), més enllà del seu gran palmarès, la “Penya”, nom com es coneix el club entre els aficionats al bàsquet, és reconeguda com una de les grans canteres de formació de jugadors del món.

Què és #joventutmodel?

Actualment, més de 500 nens i joves jugadors es formen cada any a l’escola de bàsquet i als equips inferiors del club. Tots ells aspiren a convertir-se en grans figures del bàsquet, como ho van fer Ricky Rubio, actual base dels Minnesota Timberwolves i número 5 del draft de l’NBA l’any 2009; com Rudy Fernández (Portland Trail Blazers 2008-2011 i campió de l’Eurolliga 2015), o com Raúl López (Utah Jazz, 2003-2005), però sobretot tots ells aprenen el valor de l’esport a través de la tasca educativa i d’integració social que representa el “model Joventut” des de la seva fundació fa avui 85 anys.

A què estàs contribuint?

“We believe in Basketball, we save #joventutmodel” és una campanya que té com a objectiu aconseguir els fons necessaris perquè el model de club i el seu treball de formació esportiva i humana de joves jugadors continuï un any més i no desaparegui. Totes les aportacions rebudes d’aquells que creuen en el bàsquet com ho entén el Club Joventut Badalona serviran per a completar el pressupost del club destinat a formar jugadors, molt mermat en els darrers anys per la persistència d’un entorn econòmic desfavorable.

Si creus en l’essència del bàsquet com a model de formació esportiva i humana. Si vols contribuir a salvar el model Joventut.  Col.labora amb nosaltres, clica a una de les opcions de la columna de la dreta i uneix-te a #joventutmodel. 

Parlen de la nostra campanya

Veure notícia

Veure notícia

Veure notícia


Per a més informació:

  • joventutmodel@joventutbadalona.com
  • La nostra pàgina de Facebook
  • El nostre compte de Twitter


Español aqui

IR AL INICIO

Club Joventut Badalona

Fundado en el año 1930, el Club Joventut Badalona es uno de los clubs de baloncesto de mayor prestigio e historia de Europa y del baloncesto FIBA.  Campeón de Europa y diversas veces campeón de la prestigiosa liga española (ACB), más allá de su gran palmarés, la “Penya”, nombre como se conoce el club entre los aficionados al baloncesto, es reconocida como una de las grandes canteras de formación de jugadores del mundo del baloncesto.

¿Qué es #joventutmodel?

Actualmente, más de 500 niños y jóvenes jugadores se forman cada año en la escuela de baloncesto y en los equipos inferiores del club. Todos ellos aspiran a convertirse en grandes figuras del baloncesto, como lo hicieron Ricky Rubio, actual base de los Minnesota Timberwolves y número 5 del draft de la NBA en 2009, como Rudy Fernández (Portland Trail Blazers 2008-2011 y campeón de la Euroliga 2015), o como Raúl López (Utah Jazz 2003-2005). Pero, sobre todo, aprenden el valor del deporte a través de la labor educativa y de integración social que representa el “modelo Joventut” desde su fundación hace ahora 85 años.

¿A qué estás contribuyendo?

“We believe in Basketball, we save #joventutmodel” es una campaña que tiene como objetivo conseguir los fondos necesarios para que el modelo de club y su trabajo de formación deportiva y humana de jóvenes jugadores continúe un año más y no desaparezca. Todas las aportaciones recibidas de aquellos que creen en el baloncesto como lo entiende el Club Joventut Badalona servirán para completar el presupuesto del club destinado a formar jóvenes jugadores, muy mermado en los últimos años por la persistencia de un entorno económico desfavorable.

Si crees en la esencia del baloncesto como modelo de formación deportiva y humana. Si quieres contribuir a salvar el modelo Joventut. Colabora con nosotros, haz click en una de las opciones de la columna de la derecha y únete a #joventutmodel.

Hablan de nuestra campaña

Ver noticia

Ver noticia


Ver noticia


Para más información:

  • joventutmodel@joventutbadalona.com
  • Nuestra página de Facebook
  • Nuestra cuenta de Twitter

CHOOSE YOUR PACK AT THE RIGHT COLUMN


ESCULL EL TEU PACK A LA COLUMNA DE LA DRETA


ESCOGE TU PACK EN LA COLUMNA DE LA DERECHA


* La recompensa de la pilota signada pel primer equip es donarà en mà pels propis jugadors al pabelló del Club.

* La recompensa de la pelota firmada por los jugadores del primer equipo se dará en mano por los propios jugadores en el pabellón del Club.

* The reward of the basket ball signed by the first team will be delivered by the players in our arena.

aspiran a convertirse en grandes figuras del baloncesto, como lo hicieron Ricky
Rubio, actual base de los Minnesota Timberwolves y número 5 del draft de la NBA
en 2009, como Rudy Fernández (Portland Trail Blazers 2008-2011 y campeón de la
Euroliga 2015), o como Raúl López (Utah Jazz 2003-2005). Pero, sobre todo,
aprenden el valor del deporte a través de la labor educativa y de integración
social que representa el “modelo Joventut” desde su fundación hace ahora 85
años.
¿A
qué estás contribuyendo?
“We believe in Basketball, we save #joventutmodel” es una campaña que
tiene como objetivo conseguir los fondos necesarios para que el modelo de club
y su trabajo de formación deportiva y humana de jóvenes jugadores continúe un
año más y no desaparezca. Todas las aportaciones recibidas de aquellos que
creen en el baloncesto como lo entiende el Club Joventut Badalona servirán para
completar el presupuesto del club destinado a formar jóvenes jugadores, muy mermado en los últimos años por la
persistencia de un entorno económico desfavorable. 
Si crees en
la esencia del baloncesto como modelo de formación deportiva y humana. Si quieres
contribuir a salvar el modelo Joventut. Colabora con nosotros, haz click en una de las opciones de la columna de la derecha y únete a
#joventutmodel.

story:
Please join us in raising money for our scholarship fund to bring yoga teachers and students with disabilities to the 1st Annual Accessible Yoga Conference, September 12-13, 2015 at the Santa Barbara Yoga Center in Santa Barbara, California.

Tuition is $300 per person, and we're raising $3000 to provide 10 people the chance to attend the Conference for free.

The Conference is the first opportunity of it's kind. We're bringing together the world’s leading adaptive Yoga teachers for a weekend of education, community-building, and inspiration. We’ll explore ways to make Yoga available to everyone regardless of ability. All Yoga students and teachers are welcome.

The mission of the 1st Annual Accessible Yoga Conference is to provide a forum where the Yoga community can come together to connect, share, and support those who wish to expand access to the Yoga teachings for people with disabilities, chronic illness, seniors, and people who may not feel comfortable in a regular yoga class.

The two-day program includes asana classes, workshops, and panel discussions with senior teachers in the field of adaptive Yoga. Topics range from adapting poses, making Yoga classes more inclusive, supporting Yoga teachers who have disabilities, professional networking, and community building.

For more detailed information about the Conference schedule, and to sign up, please visit our website: www.accessibleyoga.org

Thank you for joining us in making Yoga accessible to everyone!

story: Two major earthquakes and over a hundred aftershocks have caused destruction across Nepal.  More than 8,500 people are known dead and over 20,000 injured. Nepal is now in the middle of a catastrophic humanitarian disaster with monsoon rains and more landslides on their way.The non-profit Nepal Rural Health and Education Project and ACTION (American Citizens Together in Operation Nepal) fund a team of 5 trained Nepali medics on the ground providing urgently needed emergency shelter, food, water and medicine directly to those most in need in hard to reach rural areas, including Dolakha and Kavre districts.

story:
Animal Lovers by Neo Tokyo need your help to complete the final stages of development and production to launch the Total Clean Eco Toothbrush. This toothbrush will be made of biodegradable panda-friendly bamboo, designed in consultation with dentists to provide an all-over mouth clean. With your support, this ergonomic and environmental toothbrush will compete on the world market with the big corporate brands.

                                                

Why this is a fantastic project to support
In the USA alone, approximately 43,000 toothbrushes made of non-biodegradable plastics are thrown into garbage bins every day. This amounts to about 23,000 metric tons of toothbrush landfill each year, which would fill 2.5 football fields 1 metre deep in plastic toothbrushes.
The Animal Lovers Total Clean Eco Toothbrush handle will be made from panda-friendly, biodegradable and environmentally sustainable Moso bamboo.
The basic bamboo toothbrush was designed with biodegradability in mind, not advanced teeth-cleaning capabilities. We are improving the design - combining the original biodegradable qualities with dentist-approved features to give teeth and gums a deep and healthy clean. With the advanced design of the Total Clean Eco Toothbrush, we are creating a viable competitor for the plastic corporates, so people around the world can be comfortable switching to an environmentally sustainable and reasonably priced alternative.

Features of the Animal Lovers Total Clean Eco Toothbrush

  • Designed in conjunction with dental advice.
  • Easy-grip ergonomic bamboo biodegradable handle has natural flexibility, absorbing brushing pressure and reducing gum irritation.
  • Zig zag bristles with rounded tips for gentle cleaning in-between teeth and along the delicate gum line.
  • 30mm tapered head is smaller than regular over-sized toothbrush heads for easy access to those hard-to-reach places.
  • Heat treatment carbonizes the bamboo surface for water resistance and prevention of microbe growth (bacteria and moulds) during normal use.
  • Attractive, individual packaging made from recycled card makes the toothbrushes a great gift or Christmas stocking stuffer.

Where the money is going
Your contributions will help with the final development, production and shipping costs to get the Animal Lovers Total Clean Eco Toothbrush on the market. Neo Tokyo's infrastructure has the supply chain ready to go. With our background in business, we have manufacturing facilities and both design and production staff on standby - all this is wrapped in masses of industry experience and enthusiasm.

Neo Tokyo credentials
For fifteen years Neo Tokyo has been manufacturing, distributing and selling fashion items, accessories and ethical stationary. Over the years we have developed a strong belief in providing a wide range of ethical products; like our 100% animal friendly handbags produced in a factory in China that has been audited by the United Nations, meeting world ethical standards. We have a ten year involvement with WSPA (World Society for the Protection of Animals) Australia, assisting in the development, funding and marketing of their merchandise. We keep in close contact with the factories that produce our products, which includes direct visits to ensure ethical practices and quality assurance. 

www.neotokyo.com.au

The future is bright and sustainable
This project is the launch of a new fundraising initiative by Neo Tokyo, called SURF (Socially United Responsible Fundraising). SURF is the future of fundraising, working alongside Not-for-Profit Organisations to raise funds by selling items you use everyday and splitting the profits 50/50.
When the Animal Lovers Total Clean Eco Toothbrush line is produced and available for sale, we will be incorporating this innovative business model to fundraise for the IAPF (International Anti-Poaching Foundation). The profits from the Total Clean Eco Toothbrush and other everyday consumables will be split 50/50 with the IAPF, enabling the building of a much needed Wildlife Rehabilitation & Research Centre in South Africa that will help animals endangered by poaching.
SURF is sustainable, ethical and environmentally friendly - all this and great deals on things you need for everyday living.

www.neotokyo.com.au/surf

Perks details

      


Animal Lovers Foil Tee

The Animal Lovers Foil Tee  is made from super-soft, light-weight 100% baby jersey cotton.  Men’s and women’s styles and sizes available in a wide range of colors. Size XXS is suitable for children. 100% Australian Made.

If you purchase this pack we will email all the details so you can get the perfect Tee.

Bag Hooks

Keep your bags in great condition by having one of our nifty compact bag hooks in your bag at all times. Simply extend the hook and place it on the edge of any table to keep your bag off the ground and safely in your view. Comes in three beautiful colors.

Recycled Cotton & Elephant Poop Cards

These beautiful cards are handmade from elephant poop paper with envelopes or 100% recycled cotton paper. They are blank inside to allow for your own personal message.

Designed by Melbourne based artist Dan Reed.

  

Designed by Melbourne based artist Dan Reed.

Designed by Melbourne based artist Noko Washiyma.

 

 Designed by Melbourne based artist Noko Washiyma.

story:
About Us

Cataracts are the leading cause of preventable blindness worldwide. In Honduras alone, there are more than 50,000 people who suffer from cataract blindness. For almost all of these patients, vision can be fully restored with minimal resources and a 20-minute surgery. For 20 years, ECHO Foundation (Eradicating Cataracts Honduras Outreach) has supported Honduran ophthalmology with a three-fold mission: support sustainable practices that increase surgical volumes, contribute to educational and infrastructure improvements, and help grow the ophthalmology sector in Honduras.

 Before and After Cataract Surgery.

In 2013, ECHO Foundation began a partnership with the San Pedro Sula Lions Eye Hospital Fraternidad to increase the number of cataract surgeries performed at their facility as part of ECHO’s Unidos Visión Sustainability Initiative. For the past 10 years, Hospital Fraternidad has performed hundreds of cataract surgeries per year, but has yet to break 1,000. Similarly sized facilities in the developed world routinely perform several thousand surgeries per year. Along the way, we have learned that a major obstacle to increasing the number of sight-saving surgeries at Hospital Fraternidad is outdated, broken, or missing equipment.

To overcome this problem and increase the number of cataract surgeries in Honduras, we have launched a three-year fundraising campaign to bring modern equipment to this non-profit eye hospital. Over a three year period, we will launch twelve fundraising campaigns (this is campaign #2), each focused on a vital piece of equipment. With this new equipment, we expect to increase surgical volumes to 1,500 per year!

What We Need & What You Get

The second step of this three-year program to increase surgical volumes is to add a new set of cataract surgery instruments at Hospital Fraternidad, as well as enough surgical supplies to perform over 1,000 surgeries in 2015.

The current surgical instruments have been in use for quite a while, and don't include all of the instruments that can make a surgeon's job easier. The new set will consist of brand-new high quality surgical instruments, and will be tailored to meet the preferences of Drs. Pacheco and Ramirez. Happy surgeons using brand-new instruments tailored to their surgical preferences increases quality of care and the number of surgeries that can be performed. As part of this campaign, we will also help Hospital Fraternidad purchase enough supplies to exceed 1,000 cataract surgeries for 2015.

With the successful close of each quarterly campaign, we work with our partners in the US and Honduras to purchase, ship, and install the new equipment. The new operating microscopes purchased following campaign #1 are already in use at Hospital Fraternidad! Finally, we also collaborate to ensure that there are adequate resources to maintain the equipment that is being placed in the hospital.

One of the new microscopes from campaign #1 in use!

Perks

For the many of you out there thinking about it:

$25 – Thumbs up! Receive a personalized thank you post card.

$100 – Join the wall of fame! Your name will be displayed on a special wall in the hospital with other supporters (plus the above).

$250 – Wear your support! You will receive one of the 25 limited edition t-shirts designed especially for this project (plus all of the above).

$1000 – Join the club! Become a member of the select group who have supported ECHO at the Buena Vista level ($1,000 and above). You will be publicly recognized on ECHO’s website and receive a commemorative plaque thanking you for your support (plus all of the above).

$5000 – See the impact first hand in Honduras! You will receive an invitation to join one of the quarterly surgical brigades that ECHO runs and see first-hand the great work that local and volunteer doctors can do with the right equipment (plus all of the perks above).

The Wall of Fame

The Impact

Reaching 1,500 cataract surgeries per year is a realistic goal for Hospital Fraternidad with modern equipment because of the following reasons:

1.  There is a clear demand for these surgeries.

2.  ECHO and the San Pedro Sula Lions are organizations with a long-term commitment to addressing cataract blindness in Honduras.

3.  There is a growing team of committed doctors, technicians, nurses and administrators (both in the US and Honduras) working to eradicate cataract blindness.

These factors have produced a growth in the number of surgeries performed at Hospital Fraternidad from 453 in 2012 to over 800 in 2014. However, the hospital’s main bottleneck relates to the antiquated equipment that its medical staff must rely on or the missing equipment they lack.

ECHO Foundation has a 20 year track record as a protagonist for Honduran ophthalmology. The San Pedro Sula Lions have been working on issues related to Honduran ophthalmology for more than 20 years. There is every reason to expect that the hospital will one day perform 2,500 cataract surgeries per year.

 

Our team of dedicated ECHO and San Pedro Sula Lions members

Risks & Challenges

Ordinarily, it would be difficult to quantify the impacts placing surgical equipment at a facility in a developing country has on surgical volumes and facility sustainability. This is why we will be working with the San Pedro Sula Lions to closely monitor our surgical impacts, as well as the impact of our expansion program on the hospital’s financial status. 

Keeping functional equipment working and in good condition has historically been difficult at facilities in developing countries. Some of the revenues from increased surgical volumes are being set aside in a maintenance reserve to be used when needed to ensure that the equipment will remain in top working condition.

This campaign is just the second step in turning the Lion’s Hospital into a modern facility that can effectively eliminate cataract blindness in Honduras. Building upon existing in-country resources and working with an established local network will maximize the effect of each capital equipment impact. Even with limited resources, the Lions Hospital has performed hundreds of surgeries per year in the past. Your support in this campaign will allow us to grow the hospital to full operating capacity and positively impact the more than 50,000 poor cataract blind people in Honduras.

Other Ways You Can Help

Your support doesn’t just need to be a donation. It helps us and the people of Honduras if you just share the link and spread the word with your friends and family!

Use Indiegogo share tools to share this campaign. Like our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Unidos-Vision/423592447707117 and stay tuned to future campaigns and ECHO’s website for updates: www.operationECHO.org

You can also find out other ways you can support and volunteer for the cause by contacting Kyle Coffey through email kcoffey@operationecho.org

story:
THE CAUSE

My name is Carleigh Kaiser and I live in Northern Virginia. I'm 23 and excited about life! Some of my specific loves are travel & diversity, painting, songwriting and playing ultimate frisbee.

I've started this campaign because, for the past 4 years, I have struggled with chronic health issues and now things have come to a head. We have finally found a doctor who's gotten to the root cause of all my problems. For about 3 months I've been working through an integrative health plan, but my results are not forth coming. The reason?

MERCURY.

I have an extremely high level of mercury in my system (most of it probably due to my childhood immunizations & severe love of tuna) and it has drastically lowered my immunity. This is bad news because my body is trying to fight off fibromyalgia, Lyme disease that I contracted as a child, plus a candida yeast overgrowth and a few other potential bad guys in my gut & it's just too overwhelmed.

The solution?  Intravenous treatements of glutathione- as often as every day! Mercury is very hard to get rid of, but glutathione (which is a naturally occuring peptide in the body) binds to the toxic mercury and then removes it from the body. This process is called chelation therapy. It is an essential detoxer and relieves my cells of thier oxidative stress, allowing them to pick up their feet and get things done!

After my first treatment of glutathione, I was about to dance in the streets! It was a night and day difference for me. If this campaign pulls through, I will be able to use glutathione to rid my body of this toxic oppressor and my body will be able to start healing itself more effectively. After 4 long years, I couldn't thank you enough.

THE COST

To get this glutathione intravenously, I could need up to $165 a session. If I do this every day for 3 months, the cost comes to $14,850.

Since this therapy is used by more integrative health practitioners, insurance is often not accepted. And even when it is, claims are often rejected.
My father has been diligenty working for almost a year now at his job, but so much of our money is already going towards vitmans, doctors visits and organic eating. We are in a hard place financially, and so I am turning to you to come and fight this battle alongside us.

I am not the only one in my family fighting a hard health battle either. Any extra money I might raise will go directly towards the health of my precious family.

THE CHANGE

I am at a point in my life where I am working towards deciding on a direction for my future. The brain fog, fatigue, pain, and depression that have resulted from this toxicity have started to drain me of my drive and hope...but not completely!


A change in my health like the change glutathione will afford is going to set me on a course to ride out my destiny. I want to impact this world! I want to help the helpless and give hope to the hopeless. I want to share music, art, dance, love and joy. I want diversity and I want unity together.

So let's make it happen. Let's tame the toxic takeover!

CONTRIBUTE

If you just can't contribute monetarily, think about other ways to get involved:

Talk about this with your family and friends.

Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word about my cause to as many people as you can.

Thank you, thank you! You're amazing.

THE COST
To get this glutathione intravenously, I could need up to $165 a session. If I do this every day for 3 months, the cost comes to $14,850.
Since this therapy is used by more integrative health practitioners, insurance is often not accepted. And even when it is, claims are often rejected.My father has been diligenty working for almost a year now at his job, but so much of our money is already going towards vitmans, doctors visits and organic eating. We are in a hard place financially, and so I am turning to you to come and fight this battle alongside us.
I am not the only one in my family fighting a hard health battle either. Any extra money I might raise will go directly towards the health of my precious family.


THE CHANGE
I am at a point in my life where I am working towards deciding on a direction for my future. The brain fog, fatigue, pain, and depression that have resulted from this toxicity have started to drain me of my drive and hope...but not completely!
A change in my health like the change glutathione will afford is going to set me on a course to ride out my destiny. I want to impact this world! I want to help the helpless and give hope to the hopeless. I want to share music, art, dance, love and joy. I want diversity and I want unity together.
So let's make it happen. Let's tame the toxic takeover!


CONTRIBUTE
If you just can't contribute monetarily, think about other ways to get involved:
Talk about this with your family and friends.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word about my cause to as many people as you can.

Thank you, thank you! You're amazing.

story: .

My daughter was born on March 21, 2012. She was the most beautiful baby I had ever seen. She was 6 days late, so I couldn't wait to meet her. When she was born she was in great health, they found nothing wrong with her. We went home 3 days later, then life really began. She was such a happy baby, she was always smiling and laughing at everything. I was a young mom, 18 when I had her. But I never let being a young mom slow me down. Everything I did was for her. She was my motivation, and still is. On Friday August 10, 2012 Meilah passed away at four months. She was not sick, she was laughing and in great health before I layed her down for bed. It is the hardest thing I've ever been put through and even worse I'm stressing over how I am going to pay for everything. She gave me the best four months of my life and I want to be able to do something wonderful for her. I would appriciate any help that I can get.

 

It has also been brought to my attention that there are some people wanting to donate that dont have a credit/debit card,if that's the case contact Cydney at 9897140692 and arrangements can be made to pick it up, after all every little bit counts!

story:
I’m writing this letter with hopes that friends could possibly help my father. My father, Jay Merrill, was diagnosed with Myleodysplastic Syndrome about 8 months ago. I recently saw a documentary about Dr. Burzynski and his struggles to gain approval for  Antineoplaston cancer treatment, and was impressed at the overwhelming show of praise the families of loved ones saved by his clinic. My father is a great man, a hard worker, a father of five and a grandfather to thirteen. He is also a very stubborn man, who has told me he simply refuses to undergo traditional chemotherapy treatments when his disease inevitably turns into Leukemia. He believes that the chemicals used in today’s medicine are far more damaging than dying slowly from the disease they were designed to fight, and after watching a close friend of mine’s mother die in suffering from the chemo therapy she was given to fight her melanoma this past year, I can’t say I blame him. Although it hasn’t turned to full Leukemia just yet, the doctors have told us he has RAEB-II, and that the prognosis for his MDS turning into Leukemia are much higher. To me, if there is any hope to be had, it will be due to taking action sooner than later. This is why I am contacting you…I was hoping friends could possibly help my family raise money for this alternative treatment, and at least give us some hope for his survival. I’m just not ready to let him go without somewhat of a fight.

 

 My father Jay Merrill lives in Missouri and I live in Las Vegas. My parents do not have a lot of money,  I was hoping if enough people got together could help raise enough money to start these treatments.  He is in the high-risk category, and I’m afraid traditional medicine would be futile. Dr. Burzynski doesnt except insurance because its a non traditional treatment and unfortunately his treatments are expensive. im hoping to raise at least 25,000 in hopes it covers most of the medical bills. We really don’t want to see him go before his time, and my gut and all my research on alternative treatments tells me Dr. Burzynski offers him the best shot at a fighting chance. To me 67 is still too young to say goodbye. Please hear-out a family who desperately needs hope in their lives. I hope and pray i can raise enough money to send him to the Burzynski clinic in Houston Texas. He needs to start treatments in the end of february beginning of march. Thanks to anyone and everyone who takes the time to read my letter for hope... If everyone who reads this could pass on the message it would help get the word out.

story:
Poplar Place Stables and Eventing and Greenwood Equestrians are working together to raise funds in order to supplement the footing in both the outdoor and covered arenas.

The material we are going to use is recycled crumb rubber and quarry fines, in a 80% - 20% ratio. This material was used under artificial turf that has been removed, and is now being reused.

The benefits of using this product include using less water for dust control, better purchase (traction) for turning and jumping, and of course improved cushion without the additional weight of sand, weight which can possibly injure horses. After installation and mixing, we will apply a magnesium choride solution to the outdoor arena to help with additional dust control.

Total cost for both arenas will be about $4500. We invite you to help us and become part of the Poplar Place team! Thank you for your generous contribution! Your contribution will help improve the performance and safety for our riders and horses.

story:
Inspired by the diamond of the deep, Bath Diamond is designed to give you the most luxurious bathing experience with the ocean’s luxurious bioluminescence. We are the first company in the world to launch a bioluminescent bath bomb. In fact, there are barely any consumer bioluminescence products out in the market. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Bath Diamond allows you to experience the magical calming powers of the ocean, by turning your bath into a bioluminescent bay experience. It is made with naturally occurring marine luciferin and luciferase, and 100% natural essential oils that will make your skin smooth and glow. One of Bath Diamond’s active ingredients that allows for bioluminescence is coelenterazine, which has high antioxidant properties.

 

 

 

We believe in the magic of nature and the ocean’s diamond. The Bath Diamond glow is brought to you through bioluminescence which naturally occurs in the ocean. Our Marine Luciferin is a luxurious antioxidant found in deep-sea bioluminescent organisms. Bathe in its luminous, antioxidant properties, with the exceptional ability to protect cells exposed to oxidative stress. It is one of the oldest properties in Nature, and by using science developed from ancient luminous sea plants and creatures, we are able to offer you the most skin nourishing product possible.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Put the Bath Diamond Light Crystals in water and see them glow in the dark. They are safe and non-toxic. One of our active ingredients that allows for bioluminescence is coelenterazine, which has high antioxidant properties.

 

 

 

 

 

 

With the Rose 23 series, inhale the healing properties of our pure rose oil, while our blend of essential oils hydrate and aid in your skin’s repair.  It takes 60 roses to create a single drop of our 100% natural rose essential oil – the ultimate luxury. 

 

 

  1. Natural Rose Essential Oil: Pressed from natural roses, this oil hydrates dry skin, reduces signs of aging, and helps soothe cramps and migraines.
  2. Bergamot Oil: Anti-inflammatory and provides stress-reducing benefits while stimulating circulation and alleviating pain.
  3. Sweet Orange Extract: Increases the skin’s ability to absorb vitamin C, collagen production, and blood flow, all essential for anti-aging.
  4. Shea Butter: High concentration of fatty acids and vitamins makes shea butter ideal for softening and healing the skin.

 

Our blend of essential oils in the Lavender 18 series aids in skin hydration, repair, and regeneration. Plus, aromatherapy using lavender essential oil alleviates anxiety, improves sleep, and aids in mental clarity.

 

 

  1. Natural Lavender Essential Oil: Anti-inflammatory, detoxifying and healing the skin, while calming the mind.
  2. Sweet Orange Extract: Increases the skin’s ability to absorb vitamin C, collagen production, and blood flow, all essential for anti-aging.
  3. Rosemary Essential Oil: Provides skin with iron, calcium, and several essential vitamins, while improving circulation and removing excess water from the skin.
  4. Benzoin Essential Oil: Tones and tightens skin, perfect for reducing the appearance of wrinkles. 

 

 

 

 

 

The luminous experience of Bath Diamond can be a perfect gift for that special someone in your life, and for that special occasion in your relationship. 

We hope our product can bring you closer to your loved one!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

After opening the beautiful packaging you’ll find: 1 Bath Diamond + 1 Bottle of Light Crystals.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are able to share the ocean’s light with you by using bioluminescence. Marine creatures’ bioluminescent glow is produced through the oxidation of a natural molecule called Luciferin by an enzyme called Luciferase. Luciferase is able to add oxygen to the antioxidant-rich molecule, Luciferin, to activate it to shine. Just like animals burn sugar for energy, bioluminescence burns antioxidants for energy in the form of light in a 5 step process. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Bath Diamond began with a kayaking trip between friends to unplug on a journey to a renowned bioluminescent bay. Immersed in nature, life seemed to slow down. And as we paddled while night fell, we began to see ripples of light along the sides of our kayaks. 

 

Soon, the natural bio-light was glowing all around our paddles and we were left in awe by the luminous path created in the water. It was magic. Allen had the idea of creating a bioluminescent related product and after returning home, the team went straight to work researching the ocean’s bioluminescence and how we could share this with others. 

 

Now you can share this magical experience, from the comfort of your own home!

 

Enjoy!

story:
We All Need A Personal Black Box!

We've probably all heard the stale joke about building the plane out of the same material they make the black box from. But if an airplane has a black box, why shouldn't we have one? We need a means of gaining an added measure of security during crises.

Proof of Loss Required for Payment

The invention of insurance was about as close as we've gotten to black box protection. But it isn't fail safe.  We all say we're insuring our car, house, boat, or what have you. But in reality there aren't guys flying around in tights with an "S" on their chest who jump in and save our stuff right before catastrophe strikes! That would be a perfect insurance solution that would eliminate the need for insurance claims in the first place!

You must HELP YOUR INSURANCE COMPANY HELP YOU!  Do you know what your duties are toward your insurer when you send in a damage claim? Well, it's YOUR DUTY to give them tangible evidence of your claim by establishing a genuine, bona fide PROOF OF LOSS! So the minute you have a loss, you already owe your insurance company something, before they can even consider making a payout to you.

Even if you can give them evidence of loss of your important memories, the most your insurer will likely be able to do is to pay your claim, but nothing more. Even though, you've been payed, your stuff will still be gone, likely without the ability to reproduce it. Unless you Blackboxitup beforehand.

Blackboxitup.com-Personalized Black Box Protection

Our service is being designed to help you survive an unfortunate event.  It's social networking with a purpose. One that supersedes just posting pictures of yourself in a silly hat (which you can also do, if you'd like to).  We’re designing and engineering a safe, secure place to discreetly deposit your most valuable photos, recipes, art and music projects, receipts, financial, medical records and other important documentation.

But it's not just for data storage.  You're encouraged to photograph or scan your valuable property for deposit into your personal black box.  You'll be prompted to identify and value each  item so that it can be added to your personal property inventory. You can also associate it with a receipt.  This can be completed in a day or gradually, over time.

After you've deposited your items, you can retrieve and reproduce hard copy images, reports and claims, at will, as the need arises. Your information will be availble to you on multiple computers, smart phones and other devices across multiple platforms. Our entire raison d'etre is survival, protection, and helping you, help your insurance company by establishing the essential elements of a sound proof of loss after a catastrophic event.

If you do suffer a loss Blackboxitup.com will come to your aid with a couple of simple steps:

A.) Simply pull up your electronic claim form and it'll prompt you through a checklist allowing you to choose items from your inventory.  Your information will be automatically formatted into a neatly summarized claim form, accompanied by photos, and receipts. 

B.) Next, just print your completed claim and email, fax, snail mail or hand deliver it to your Adjuster and they'll have the documentary evidence necessary to establish your proof of loss, which will help them adjust and pay your claim.

Depending on your insurance coverage, you can recover the reproduction costs of your documents and photos.  There's enough to worry about after a catastrophe, already. Let alone worrying about your stuff! If you don't Blackboxitup, you'll never be able to accomplish the extensive level of reproduction that will be needed, if all is lost.

This procedure can be used for other purposes, too, such as producing well supported banking, business and financial statements, creating your will, etc. There are countless possibilities and scenarios.  We're certain you'll think of more uses for these important tools as time goes on.  Blackboxitup.com will also help you stay in touch with your network and the community at large, across multiple platforms and integrated services as a central meeting location.  This would be beneficial for a planning a party, and crucial during a crisis. 

A mall area will be establish, too, where we'll feature all of the goods, gear & gadgetry.  This will include items like smart phones and accessories, scanniers, and computers.  Also, disaster supplies will be featured for your planning needs, along with weather and catastrophe specific updates at a glance.

About the Founder

First of all, I genuinely love people and having had extensive experience in public service as a government officer in various capacities, I continue to consider myself to be a humble public servant.

Additionally, I'm a consultant representing Fortune 500 companies, specializing in back bone infrastructure development.  Primarily, my responsibilities are in telecommunications, currently.  I also have a background in claims administration and amongst other business licenses, in multiple states, I'm a licensed Catastrophic Claims Adjuster.  Blackboxitup.com is a culmination of my diverse experiences as my team and I address preparedness planning as our pleasure in providing a critically needed public service.

Lemony Snickets - I've Personally Experienced A Series of Unfortunate, Catastrophic, Life-Altering Events!

I mentioned in the video describing this project that you may have a catastrophic event. Well, we never really seem to expect it to happen to us, I know first hand, because I didn't expect it either. But, I've had a number of experiences in life that I can only say, modified my existence on this planet. Here are a just a few: My vehicle was robbed, with 2 computers stolen alon with my family's passports, various, other important documents and thousands of irreplaceable photos & docs. on my hard drives.

A couple of years ago after a routine physical I was diagnosed with the 'Big C'. Fortunately for me I'm now a cancer SURVIVOR! Last year we experienced significant tornado and lightning damage and worst of all, this spring, my home was burglarized. Along with computers, the burglars stole my entire home study including every single personal photo, negative, video tape & DVD I owned. I now have no photos of my youth, wedding or my family remaining except those that were digitized and saved elsewhere!

What I miss most of all is seeing photos of my wife and I together when we were younger, as well as our children's baby pictures & loved ones who've since passed away. It hurts deeply to even mention these details. But, I now know resoundingly, that this could happen to anyone! After all, the disasters that we hear about in the media are happening to someone. At some point in the future that someone may well be you or me! Most of the people who experience disasters probably thought: 'it'll never happen to me', right before it actually did happen to them.

What was the Genesis of Blackboxitup.com?

As you might imagine, when I received a cancer diagnosis and chemotherapy beckoning me in my future, it also armed me with a bucket list. So, before I started chemo, I decided to leave the north country with my son and head back out to Moshav Beit Zayit by the Jerusalem Forest, where I spent time as a youth, because I wasn't sure if I could ever return there again and I wanted to go back at least one more time.

My son and I took fabulous photos there. So I started thinking to myself: 'I know, material things aren't the most important in the world, especially now...But if I had to chose some, which of them would be the most important to me?' Of course most things are replaceable, but important video memories and original documents often can't be reproduced. So I realizing that we're all in the same boat, I concluded that everyone needs black box protection. This was the seed of the idea. In the Hebrew language Genesis is Bereshit or looseley, "in the beginning", thus, in this way Blackboxitup.com was born.

Critical Conditions Hard To Deal With Worldwide

You can call it 'Global Warming', '2012', 'The End of the World', 'The Last Days of the System of Things', or like Michael Jackson said "blame it on the boogie!" But SOMETHING WEIRD IS GOING ON IN THE ENVIRONMENT NO MATTER HOW YOU SLICE IT!!! Whatever the reasons, our home, the earth, is experiencing an increasingly dramatic, catastrophic turn of events that are totally beyond our ability to control.

Plus, these things have been happening with seemingly greater frequency and intensity and in one place after the other, as if with birthing pains. Whether great earthquakes, epoch fires, large scale floods, super tornadoes, hurricanes, typhoons, cyclones, tsunamis, sink holes, and the list goes on!

How many years have we all heard that California is due for a major earthquake? Scientists have research that indicates the great earthquake will extend from Baja California, in Mexico, all of the way up north into the Bay area! Here's a test: take any of the disaster types mentioned above, perform a search on any given day and see where one of these events may be in progress right now. This makes it all the more imperative that we develop a diversity of personalized black box protection options.

Why is funding needed?

We need about $30,000.00 to complete our initial phase, substantially more will be needed to complete the next phases of our project. This is an active work in progress with a real budget and an active schedule. To date, our team is about one-third of the way towards completion, I've personally funded it thus far and come what may, I'll see it through to completion (remember my bucket list wishes and raison d'etre?). Having overcome cancer, I'm a real SURVIVOR, our team will get this project launched come heck or high water, quite possibly, literally speaking!

Our project addresses a critical need and we really want this to be a community effort from design to launch and beyond! We hope that by working together, we'll help the site become an integral part of our respective survival preparedness planning. Whereas there are destructive elements in this world that threaten our personal peace and security. So we welcome your support!

Engineering & Design Phases:

1.) The website and subject of this project is the Phase I.  We'll finalize, beta test and launch the fully operational website. Although, the basic framework has already been engineered, we can't convey any more vehemently that we're giving all supporters an opportunity to vocalize the features that you'd like to see incorporated into your personal black box. We'd like to include features that you'd enjoy most, so please share them with us while we're still in the first phase. Please use this opportunity to HAVE YOUR VOICE HEARD because we'll listen attentively to you!

2.) In Phase II, we're developing a full complement of smartphone applications. It's features will make it easy for you to take a photo, identify and assign a value or receipt to an item for your inventory list and deposit it into your personal black box.

3.) Phase III, may be the most exciting of all! In this phase we'll finalize the engineering of a physical personal black box which will be offered first to current members of Blackboxitup.com at the time of its release. It'll have some amazing features, which we look forward to sharing with you in the future!

Once Phase One has been accomplished, we'll keep you posted on the development of subsequent phases and again, incorporate your voice in future developments. We're very curious to hear what features you'd like to have in a physical black box of your very own!

We also welcome your personal support and request that you, please, share details with your friends, family and associates about our exciting projects on Facebook, Google, Twitter, Linkedin, etc.

Despite all of the challenges we all face, we're living an exciting time period for technological development! This is proven by the aforementioned sites who are doing a fabulous job in their respective niches! It's also time for Blackboxitup.com to take its place in our lives and help us through trying times. What an honor and privilege it would be to be mentioned in the same breath as the preceding operations at some time in the future.

As you lend your support to our project, we trust that you'll never, ever forget that you were right here with us at the beginning of it all. Furthermore, neither will we! Right now, time is of the essence in getting this project off the ground and WE THANK YOU, IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR TIME, CONSIDERATION AND SUPPORT!

The team at Blackboxitup.com
