story:
Introduction

“I know you’ve been dealing with this illness for quite a while now. Things don’t seem to be getting better and I can tell you’re a little bit scared. Can you do me a favor and check out this documentary. And then maybe when you feel like it could you watch this DVD tell me what you think? Thanks, I love you…”

How would you like to put in the hands of someone who is suffering from a chronic disease the facts that could be instrumental for their recovery? Is there no greater joy or purpose in life than trying to save someone you love?

Hi, My name is Liam Gallegos. I represent an international network of Artists and Filmmakers who have launched a global campaign to bring awareness to a problem that affects us all.

Why Indiegogo?

Check out the trailer below. 'Paris Noir' is our most recent film shot in Paris, France in the summer of 2012. Although we have successfully funded this project as well as various other ventures, because of it’s educational nature, slightly controversial subject matter and lengthy time commitment, using traditional funding sources for this campaign are not possible


What do you get?

Join the Crusade - Information is power

We are at the dawn of new Golden Age of knowledge and understanding on how the human body works. Here we open up this world of medical nutrition in the form of a website we have curated, at the cost of a movie just for you. It provides a framework, dispels myths and introduces you into the ortho-molecular world of clinical nutrition with links to videos and short easy to read articles.  Educate before you medicate!


It's important to look and feel AMAZING! 

For the price of taking a friend out to lunch you also get access to a second website which targets weight loss. Here we challenge you to reach for the vitality of life ASAP. The same moves that fight illness can turn you into a lean mean woo-woo machine! It's true.

On this site you will find out the names of these medical professionals we view as true blue American heroes. You get to hear them on their Health Talk radio shows with numbers to call where you can contact them concerning your health problems or the health problems of someone close to you. But the main purpose of this website is to give you the tools you need to follow a 'sure as gravity' program to lose weight and feel great. Tune in, turn on, drop out & grow rich with everything life has to offer!

 

The Problem

Personally, over the years something has emerged and become quite clear and disturbing. Out of all the chronic diseases to plague my family and friends over 80 percent of these illnesses have attacked women. Ask a doctor ‘why is this happening?’ or ‘what is causing this?’ and they'll say it's either faulty genes or just plain bad luck.

Over the last 40 years and after a few billion dollars in groundbreaking research a team of courageous, almost ‘Action Hero’ like, American medical professionals are saying there is nothing that could be further from the truth.

Because a women’s body is designed to build other human beings, she is naturally predisposed to lose massive amounts of nutrients she needs for wellness via monthly cycles as well as pregnancy.

But we get everything we need from our food, right? Here’s how these medical ‘Action Hero’ guys and gals respond.

“One sentence has killed more people than all the wars in American History… You get all the nutrition you need from the 4 food groups!” According to the USDA from 1950 to 1999 we saw a dramatic decline in the nutrient density of our food supply, in some cases as much as 90 percent.

As a result, if these basic building blocks are not there this deficit in a women’s human being building physiology will eventually lead her into a chronic disease state. Today, we know this to be a scientific fact.

Regardless of intent, ignoring the nutritional requirements of her biology, women are effectively turned into an ATM machine for the drug companies and the Medical Industry. Today's MD directed healthcare results in the disenfranchisement of women by a medical institution that is at best incompetent and at worst corrupt.

The Solution

Fortunately, America is home to a gallant team of medical professionals who tell us our current model of MD directed medicine for the treatment of chronic disease is an abomination, it’s uninformed, it’s disgraceful and needs to stop yesterday. They say science has lead us into the dawn of a new understanding on health and how and how the human body works.

With their courage and passion they battle Big Pharma on one hand and save lives with the other. The US medical establishment is a 1.2 trillion dollars a year industry that wants to close the door these American medical professionals have opened.

We think this story needs to be immortalized on film and we believe this information with a focus on the health needs of women, should be spread in a series of infotainment products, dubbed in multiple languages and distributed around the world.

Become a Prophet determined to STOP IT!

Get your hands on the Disease/Primary Nutrient chart. Here you can print out a chart tailored to the personality of a loved one with nine styles to choose from. Each details the clinically verified discoveries science has made concerning the correlation of illnesses to specific nutrient deficiencies. With this information on the on the desk refrigerator or wall the idea of Clinical Nutrition will become easier for the loved ones in your life to understand.

 

Become a Fashionista Superhero!

Be part of an elite team of fashion conscious Divas and Demigods using Original Artworks and quotations on everything from T-shirts and coffee cups to spread the word and save Humanity! Membership to this online store will be offered to Indiegogo members associated with this campaign ONLY. When people say "WOW! Where did you get that?" You can say, "I'm a Superstar. It came with the job...

Impact

The fact is a persistent disease state in the body is often accompanied by a mental depression and anxiety. To talk about new exciting clinically verified findings which work for everyone sounds to good to be true. And when you're gripped with sickness and fear the chance words by themselves will resonate is difficult if not impossible to imagine. But if someone is given one of our documentaries or a Contemporary Health Education DVDs they will be able to receive this information at their leisure. The entire family can watch and learn as well.


If you support and promote the structure and function of the body with the raw materials it needs every day, magic happens. We know today that it’s a scientific fact.

You can help us spread this message of life, health and happiness to the women in your life, to those you love and to those who need help around the world while you power up with knowledge, health, power and enlightenment!

(WARNING: The primary purpose of all Perks we offer is to engage and inform. The websites we offer have over 40 pages of quality links and curated info. In a few pages you will find links to products that are offered for sale. You will find three books which will teach you how to prevent and treat over 900 diseases. If you should decide to purchase these items please understand we DO NOT get compensation. There are a few pages that have nutritional supplementation products we recommend for optimal health. If you should decide to purchase these items please understand we DO get compensation. You are not under any obligation to purchase any item whatsoever.)


Other perks include:

  • Recognition - You can be included in the documentary credits as a Sliver, Gold, or Platinum donor.
  • Membership - Lifetime access to the Contemporary Health Education Membership site.
  • Personal Touch - You can have personal consultations to help you support and promote the structure and function of your physiology necessary for optimal health . 
  • Be A Movie Star - You can be included as a participant in one of our productions. We give you the resources to develop a Wellness strategy and then track and document the progress for the big screen.

 

In Conclusion

What brought us out of the ‘Dark Ages’ was people around the world finally said, ‘Look, I don’t need no dude in a funny hat to tell me what’s up with my relationship with God. Me and God will do just fine without you.” And it’s those people who laid the foundation for personal Liberty and ended up circumnavigating the globe.

This fundamental shift in thinking was met by the Church and Royal Families who completely freaked out! They boiled people in oil, pulled them apart with horses and put Galileo under house arrest until he died.

But the shift happened anyway.

Today, we are at the dawn of a New Renaissance happening at exponential speed. We saw the Organic food movement explode where people around the world said “Look, I don’t need no dude in a white jacket to tell me it’s OK to eat pesticides, GMO’s and growth hormones. Me and my health will do just fine without your Frankenfood.”

And with every Renaissance comes an Inquisition. And today, as was way back when, we have institutions going completely mental with massive collection of private communications, a fictional financial crisis and wars that never seem to end.

But no worries...

We believe if we protect our loved ones from nutrient deficits with a special emphasis on the members of society who build other Human Beings, only good things can be a result.

The sooner we make the shift, the sooner we’ll be able to circumnavigate the Universe!

Stop the Exploitation & Save Someone You Love.

Sincerely,
Liam Gallegos

Membership - Lifetime access to the Contemporary Health Education Membership site.

Personal Touch - You can have personal consultations to help you support and promote the structure and function of your physiology necessary for optimal health . 

Be A Movie Star - You can be included as a participant in one of our productions. We give you the resources to develop a Wellness strategy and then track and document the progress for the big screen.

 
In Conclusion
What brought us out of the ‘Dark Ages’ was people around the world finally said, ‘Look, I don’t need no dude in a funny hat to tell me what’s up with my relationship with God. Me and God will do just fine without you.” And it’s those people who laid the foundation for personal Liberty and ended up circumnavigating the globe.
This fundamental shift in thinking was met by the Church and Royal Families who completely freaked out! They boiled people in oil, pulled them apart with horses and put Galileo under house arrest until he died. 
But the shift happened anyway.
Today, we are at the dawn of a New Renaissance happening at exponential speed. We saw the Organic food movement explode where people around the world said “Look, I don’t need no dude in a white jacket to tell me it’s OK to eat pesticides, GMO’s and growth hormones. Me and my health will do just fine without your Frankenfood.”And with every Renaissance comes an Inquisition. And today, as was way back when, we have institutions going completely mental with massive collection of private communications, a fictional financial crisis and wars that never seem to end.
But no worries...


We believe if we protect our loved ones from nutrient deficits with a special emphasis on the members of society who build other Human Beings, only good things can be a result.
The sooner we make the shift, the sooner we’ll be able to circumnavigate the Universe!
Stop the Exploitation & Save Someone You Love.
Sincerely,Liam Gallegos

story:
In the fifteen years Jan spent working on the assembly line at General Motors, she was exposed to harsh chemicals that have detrimentally affected her health. Now several years removed from these harsh conditions and with an encyclopedia-sized stack of hospital records in her name, Jan’s health has only worsened. As Jan stays in Michigan caregiving for her elderly mother, she has found that not a single insurance company in the state offers a plan that covers holistic medicine. In recent weeks, Jan has developed an intestinal issue that has greatly reduced her appetite and subsequent nutrient intake. With each visit to the hospital, she leaves more frustrated by the doctor’s refusal to address the underlying problem, and his insistence on prescribing pharmaceuticals as a short term solution, with long term consequences. Without the funds necessary to see a certified naturopathic practitioner, we are left self diagnosing the problem and floundering for solutions.  Your donation will help support the initial visit to our chosen naturopath, and continue to perpetuate the health plan she creates. By supporting this cause you are helping secure the life of the bedrock of our family and our gratitude cannot be measured. However, we are committed to giving back to you in an artistic, comedic, interesting way and will try to brighten your day as you have illuminated our family's lives!

Perks for donors include videos of us singing you personalized songs, epic lip synched renditions of your favorite tunes, an ASL poem or story telling piece for our Deaf and Hard of Hearing friends, a message from a member of our family, or a sock puppet reenactment of your favorite movie (seriously, we will do this). We know that times are tough for most, and encourage those who cannot donate to spread our campaign’s message to friends and family. Thank you again for your support, and remember it takes little “u” and “i” to spell community. :)



In Gratitude,

story:
In late March our mom was diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumor. Our dad was with her through all of the tests and surgeries. He took care of her everyday at home; making sure she took her medicines, got to her chemo and radiation treatments, anything she needed. At 78 it was not an easy thing for him but he felt the need to be her everything - and he was. When it got to be too much we convinced him to allow us and visiting nurse services to help. By June she was in the hospital awaiting a bed in a hospice home. Dad did everything that he could to make her comfortable.

After Mom passed, Dad did everything that needed to be done and now is a little lost. He spends most of his day in the house they shared for over 30 years. We think he should take a break and get away.

We would like to be able to send him and a companion some where exciting/busy to build new memories. We would like to raise enough money to send him to Las Vegas or New Orleans for a week. If we surpass our goal by enough we may instead send him on a cruise.

After Mom passed, Dad did everything that needed to be done and now is a little lost. He spends most of his day in the house they shared for over 30 years. We think he should take a break and get away. We would like to be able to send him and a companion some where exciting/busy to build new memories. We would like to raise enough money to send him to Las Vegas or New Orleans for a week. If we surpass our goal by enough we may instead send him on a cruise.

story:
Safe Waves - A day of surf lessons for sexual assault survivors, advocates, and volunteers.

Who are you?

I'm Chelsea. I'm a surfer, a communications and marketing professional, and a volunteer advocate for Sexual Assault Response Services of Southern Maine (SARSSM).

As a volunteer with SARSSM, I answer crisis and support line phone calls, accompany victims to the hospital, and work with victims in crisis to minimize the trauma resulting from sexual assault.

Safe Waves will bring together my two passions — volunteering and surfing.

Surfing? SARSSM? Sounds good, so what?

I've been surfing for two years. After only one weekend’s worth of lessons, I bought a wetsuit and board, and I've spent every moment I can since then catching waves. (Okay, okay, mostly catching foam, but you gotta start somewhere, right?)

Surfing is an incredible sport — It's a solo activity with a tight-knit community. It builds confidence and strength, both physical and mental. You are in control of yourself and your board, but you are also at the will of the waves, tides, and winds. Surfing is humbling and empowering at the same time.

I took my first surf lessons with Wahine Kai, an all-women's surf school in Maine. I dove in with a group of first-time surfers, all women 30 years old and over. The thing I remember best about that weekend was every time a woman got up on the board for the first time, you'd hear cheering from the group, followed by "That was AWESOME!" from the surfer.

Every time: "That was AWESOME!"

Those three words sum up not just the thrill of surfing, but also the hidden strength and confidence each of us discovered that day. I want to bring that once-in-a-lifetime experience to survivors of sexual assault and the advocates and volunteers who work tirelessly to help them. But to make it a reality, I’ll need some donations.

So I give you money. Then what?

Once you pony up, a few exciting things will follow. First is that I'll be able to make this event happen. Donations will pay for lessons, transportation, breakfast, and any swimwear or other accessories a participant may need.

Wahine Kai has graciously agreed to offer lessons at a huge discount for our new surfers. And the wonderful folks at SARSSM have offered to coordinate a post-surfing barbecue. I want to make this an extra-special day, so if we can all give enough, I'll be able to provide breakfast for the group, and any extra funds will be used to buy stickers or t-shirts so each participant has something to remember the day. Beyond that, leftover funds will be used as seed money for the (hopefully) next Safe Waves event.

But what about ME? What do I get?

Every donation gets my undying gratitude.

Plus, there are lots of perks for early donors - many of the perks are unique or handmade and from local businesses.

I will also do some one-off fundraising events this summer. Keep an eye out for details.

I'm kinda broke right now, but I'd like to help out. What can I do?

  • Let your friends know about this campaign -- post it on your Facebook page or group page.
  • Volunteer your time -- Help me organize and coordinate, or help out at the event.
  • Share your talent -- Can you use a camera? Edit video? Want to design a logo, t-shirt, or sticker?
  • Donate perks -- Stickers, surf wax, beanies, anything you can give to help thank our donors.

Here's a good place to thank my other supporters: Marqui Creations, SplurgeSisters, Long's Board Shop, Wheels N Waves, Melanson Pottery. Add your name to the list!

Say hi at bizchelsea@gmail.com. Thanks in advance!

I'm a sexual assault survivor, and I want to learn to surf.  How can I get involved?

Email me at bizchelsea@gmail.com and let's get you "on board"! (I will, of course, keep your information confidential.)

story:
Due to the damage done to his kidneys by a Clinic doctor, John has to go to dialysis three times a week. 

The ordeal often leaves him weak, disoriented, and completely tired.

Due to this schedule, no one will hire him at his old profession, and as a result he quickly ran out of funds and his possessions.

He's subject to body shakes, and dizziness so bad, he can't walk without aid, or a walker/wheelchair. He got so bad with the disorientation, that he couldn't turn his head without falling on the floor. 

Due to the loss of kidney function, he's aging much more rapidly, and subject to hair and weight loss.

To date he's lost over 70 pounds.

Not being able to continue working, he slept in his car for almost 4 years, until the company that allowed him to park off street, went out of business and sold the building. As a result his vehicle was towed and he ended up on the street. A terrible  depression led him to try a desperate act, and he was admitted to Kaiser for observation and dialysis. After several months they failed to find him a center and some sort of shelter. With minimal insurance and costs escalating, the hospital discharged him with less than a minute warning. Not allowed to stay until he could arrange something, they forced him to sign the papers, and put him into a wheelchair, took him down the street and dumped him on a bench at a local bus stop. 

If anyone can help him with this issue legally, please feel free to contact him.

Weak from recent dialysis, and with no money and nowhere to go, he was stranded there as he couldn't walk or even stand. One of the nurses who didn't like what had happened, called his emergency contact.

His friend came to his aid, and had to support him to get him into the car, bringing him to county hospital.

 At Oliveview, they continued his dialysis, and the social worker found a placement in a dialysis center in Compton, as well as a nursing home just a few miles away. This situation is only temporary, and he needs to find his own living quarters, as well as the funds he needs to carry him while doctors help him with his kidney issues. He needs better insurance, and some food and shelter. Due to his age he's not the first person on the transplant list,.

His body deteriorating, and now not able to do the work he loved, he fights the disease and depression every day. 

But it's beginning to take its toll.

Here is a direct link to just some of the past work in the special effects industry that he loved so much..

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0212668/?ref_=fn_al_nm_1

To date he's still residing at the care center, and using a walker full time. He still has trouble standing unassisted. He's fallen twice, and they're afraid he'll break a bone, or worse a hip. They've suggested he start using a wheelchair, but the cost is prohibitive. He's been there since June of last year. He feels alone and abandoned, and that his life has been taken away from him. Not long ago he was walking fine and without aid. And now his dizziness and legs won't support him at all. He can only stand for a few minutes before he either has to sit or lay down. He's not sure what to do. 

So please help him

Donate a little, donate a lot, think of this as a way of thanking him for all the entertainment and joy he's brought to the film world.

Or just to help a human being, who happens to be a really nice person.

We can't change the past, so lets try to give him a future.

Thank you.

ACM

story:
Hi, My name is Matthew Helmke. I was born and raised in Nevada. I'm a proud Navy Veteran, having served our country in the Gulf War. Last September, at the age of 35, I was diagnosed with Central Nervous System Lymphoma....brain cancer. I thought my life was over. I immediately had surgery to remove the cancer, and then began a grueling in hospital chemo. Every other Tuesday I spent 5 days inpatient at the Huntsman Cancer Institute in Salt Lake City receiving treatment. I never thought I'd be able to do the things I enjoy again. Just 3 months after my last chemo, I walked over 20 miles in my first "Relay for Life". I want to help others know that you can get better and step forward. On September 12th of 2013, it will be one year since my diagnosis. To mark this bittersweet occasion, I’m going to walk more than 450 miles across my state of Nevada. It is my sincere hope that I can raise money, awareness, and provide encouragement for others on the same journey.

        Together we can step forward....together we WILL win!!!

story:
Hi my name is Kristy Lockhart and my best friend has been diagnosed with Lyme Disease. It took her years and 50 doctors to finally recieve a proper diagnosis. I wish to do everything I can to help her. This is a desperate plea to everybody to please help me financially get her back to the U.S.A for another round of treatment. In Canada proper testing and treatment are not available. The majority of people with Lyme disease are misdiagnosed for years and by the time it is discovered it is almost too late. The very first visit to the USA that day cost me $1500. Thanks to YOU and your generous donations I was able to provide this for Heather. Monthly treatment (not including her antibiotics) suggested from the lyme doctor is hundreds of dollars on potent specialized probiotics that have to be special ordered, certain vitamins and minerals, supplements as well as a very strict NO yeast/gluten/wheat/yeast/sugar diet. Everyday she has to also juice a variety of greens so her body can absorb the nutrients properly. One teaspoon of sugar/honey/sweetner/etc can suppress Heather's immune system for 6 hours. Also she recieves monthly treatment as well from a wonderful Lyme literate Naturopath.

4 years ago she had a gym membership, walked 5 miles a day, hiked, spent time in nature, and constantly doing photo shoots. Now, she can't walk more than 20 minutes, becomes so fatigued far too quickly, has difficulty breathing, chest pains, migraines, her joints swell up so bad she can't write or type, difficulty folding laundry, doing dishes and playing with her cat. Something in her body is malfunctioning as her entire body is covered in edema.

This woman means everything to me. I can't put into words how much I love her. She is an amazing artist/photographer (www.redbubble.com/people/locustgirl) and a genuine pure soul and there's nothing I won't do for her. Meeting someone like this only happens once in a lifetime, and I fear her lifetime will be over soon if her medical treatment is unable to continue.

Donating to this compaign will ensure proper medical care and treatment and lodging while undergoing this care. It doesn't matter if it's $1 or $1000 every little bit helps. Even if you have no $ to donate, please will you post this on various social networking tools to spread the word?

Even while ill, both she and I helped out with other fundraisers (Rideau Valley Wildlife Sanctuary) by donating hundreds of dollars worth of her art to be sold to help treat injured wildlife. She went to college to learn how to take care of the disabled, now she is disabled.

She left home at 15 and she has no blood relatives who can help her, and she hasn't worked for the last 3 years due to being so ill. I am a single woman and the ONLY person who has been helping her for years, please can you help me help her? My best friend, Heather, has seen 50 doctors in the last 4 years (including 3 neurosurgeons, infectious disease doctors, rheumetologists, dermotologists, neurologists) which she was left with no definitive answers as to the root cause of all her symptoms, until now. Lyme disease, if not detected in the early stages becomes chronic lyme and ends up attacking the heart, kidneys and liver.

We are givers and this is very hard to ask for help. To prove this, for certain denominations I will print and mail to you your choices from Heather's photography gallery. If you love wildlife and nature or creative works combining the beautiful female form with nature, you are sure to love Heather King's artwork. Please do not place an order through RedBubble as you will be charged for the prints and you have already generously donated to this campaign. Please use Redbubble as a gallery and email me directly what prints you would like. Any questions or for a list of the prints you would like, please email me here lockhart_ottawa@hotmail.com

I promise you if you were to meet Heather you would love her almost as much as I do. I have never met another soul with such an enormous loving heart as hers. Please helps us love Kristy
